[\[1b.1\]{D746}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_/Ar+ya bid+yA ut+ta ma ma hA tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rig pa mchog gi rgyud chen po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[1b.2\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' 
[\[1b.3\]]ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rig pa bye ba phrag du mas bskor nas/_/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bar 
[\[1b.4\]]snang las babs te/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas byang

[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'byung po bye ba phrag du mas bskor nas 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[2a.2\]]dang phyag na rdo rje la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas gdol pa'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi yang g.yog 'khor bye ba phrag du mas kun nas bskor te 'khor 
[\[2a.3\]]de nyid du 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[2a.4\]]ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du bdag gsang sngags kyi tshig 'chad par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[2a.5\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje khyod ni shin tu ma rungs pa/_lag na rdo rje khyod ni shin tu brtsam pa med pa/_shin tu gtum pa yin na/_ci ltar sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsang sngags 
[\[2a.6\]]'chang /_lag na rdo rje khyod ni dam tshig shes pa yin la/_sems can gang dag dam tshig mi shes par brjod pa rnams ni rdo rjes mthar byed pa yin na/_khyod ci ltar gsang sngags 'chang /_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]mod kyi/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag rig pa mchog 'di'i don 'don pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_mchod pa bgyid pa de dag ni bdag gi dam tshig 'tshal ba lags/_bdag gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa lags pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba mdzad du gsol/_
[\[2b.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi yi ge bzhi pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa las mang po rab tu sgrub pa/_stobs dang pha rol gnon pa 
[\[2b.3\]]dpag tu ma mchis pa bstan pa thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po bshad par bgyi'o/_/kye kye lha yul dang sa dang chu la gnas pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs rnams khyed yid rtse gcig tu gyis la nyon cig_/rdo rjes mgo bkas par gyur 
[\[2b.4\]]ta re/_de nas lag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa'i tshogs la bltas nas gsang sngags smras pa/_/na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/_na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pANi s+ya/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/_/ma hA shAkya sam+dud+d+hA ya/_birli/_kirli/_mirli/_hirli/_bid+yA t+to ma ya rtsi rmi ni du rmi ni 
[\[2b.5\]]li swA hA/_de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'dar yed yed nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la bskyab tu gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag la bskyab tu gsol/_de nas 
[\[2b.6\]]gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig_/rig pa'i rgyal po dran par gyis shig ces dbugs phyung ngo /_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_bcom 
[\[2b.7\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'di lta bu'i gsang sngags kyi tshig dag 'chad pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni rig pa'i rgyal po gang na gnas pa der mchod par 'tshal lo/_/
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]su klog pa dang /_mchod par bgyid pa dang /_sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang de'i brtson pa bskyed par bgyi'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i las ni 'di lags te/_srad 
[\[3a.2\]]bu'am thal ba'am chu la lan cig brjod pas bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags bcad na mtshon rnon po la lan gnyis brjod de rtswa ku sha gcad do/_/yang na sa dra'o/_/de ltar na rig sngags thams cad gcad par 'gyur ro/_/lan gsum brjod na rig 
[\[3a.3\]]sngags tshang bar 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la rig sngags gang yi ge ma tshang ba'am dran pa nyams pa de lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de/_rig pa'i mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig tu lan gsum brjod na 
[\[3a.4\]]rmi lam du ston to/_/ci ste las bcad par gyur na rtswa ku shas byab par bya ste rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan bzhi brjod na dge ba dang mi dge ba ston par 'gyur ro/_/ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du sbyor ba bgyis na las rnams su 'gyur ro/_/gdon 
[\[3a.5\]]tshar gcad na thal ba'am chu'am dur khrod kyi sol bas bsnun no/_/yang na gzugs bgyis te lcug mas bzhus na gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na sa la gzugs bgyis te dur khrod kyi sol bas lag mthil la rdo rje bris te lag pas bkab na gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[3a.6\]]skud pa la mdud pa bor ba rnams kyis rig sngags bcing ngo /_/mkha' 'gro ma rnams bcad par bgyis na yungs kar dag la lan bdun bdun bsngags te bsnun na mkha' 'gro ma thams cad ma rungs par 'gyur ro/_/dbab par bgyi na rna bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/
[\[3a.7\]]yang na tsan dan dmar pos dkyil 'khor byugs la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bris te gu gul gyis bdug pa dang me tog rnams kyis dbab bo/_/phyag rgya gzhig na chu'am thal lcag gam/_so phag gi dum bu rnams kyis so/_/dug las gson chu'am/_rma bya'i mdongs sam/_chu 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]gri'am/_me long gis so/_/mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du zhag gsum smyung bar byas la lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes dam pa stsol bar 'gyur te/_de'i 'og tu dug gso ba la sogs pa dang 
[\[3b.2\]]las gzhan rnams kyang bgyi'o/_/gal te mkha' 'gro ma rnams shin tu bcad par 'tshal na de nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du 'bras kyi gzegs mas lan brgya stong du sbyin sreg bgyis na lag na rdo rjes ji skad bshad pa bzhin du tshe ci tsam 'dod thub par rig sngags 
[\[3b.3\]]thams cad ma rungs par 'gyur ro/_/seng ldeng gi rdo rje bgyis te rig sngags 'chang gi ming nas brjod la sa la lan cig btsugs nas bshig par 'gyur te/_de phyin cad rig sngags 'chang de'i gsang sngags rnams mi 'jug go/_/rig sngags gcad par bgyid 'tshal 
[\[3b.4\]]na/_rig sngags 'chang gi gzugs bgyis pa gcad na bcad pa bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags bshig par bgyid 'tshal bas rig sngags de rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig brjod na rig sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur te las mi bgyid do/_/
[\[3b.5\]]rig pa 'gugs par 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis te/_rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na rig pa 'gugs te phyis rig pa bsgrub bo/_/rig pa nyams 
[\[3b.6\]]par bgyis na bzlas brjod byas pas chog ste/_che ge mo'i rig pa la gnod pa mdzod cig ces bgyis na rig pa de las mi bgyid do/_/rig pa tshar gcad par bgyi na thal ba la gzugs bgyi ste/_rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig brjod la rkang pa g.yon pas kyang phyis na rig 
[\[3b.7\]]pa smad pa dang nyams par 'gyur te las mi bgyid do/_/gal te rig sngags 'chang ga zhig par 'tshal na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig sngags 'chang gi ming nas brjod de mar me'i snying po me lce dang bcas pa bdun sbyin sreg bgyis na rig sngags 'chang bshig par 'gyur te bsod 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]nams kyang 'jig go/_/srog kyang 'jig go/_/rig sngags 'chang de'i tshe ci tsam par gsang sngags rnams mi 'grub bo/_/slar gso bar bgyi nam la ta'i me tog mar la smyugs pa'i sbyin sreg bgyi ba lan nyi shu rtsa gcig lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sbyin 
[\[4a.2\]]sreg bgyis na rig pa 'grub bo/_/las 'di dag ni ma bsgrubs kyang bgyid do/_/ci ste bgyid 'tshal na ri la 'dzegs te kha zas 'o skyo 'thung zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur te de la bu ci bya zhes gsung 
[\[4a.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/des bcom ldan 'das las thams cad mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang yang 'gug go/_/grog mkhar gyi sa las 
[\[4a.4\]]sbrul bgyis te sngags kyis btab na klu thams cad 'chi'o/_/dbang du yang 'gyur ro/_/gseg ma la lan bdun bsngags te mtshor bor na mtsho skam par 'gyur ro/_/'bab chu chen por bor na 'bab chu chen po skam par 'gyur ro/_/gang du bor ba de skam par 'gyur 
[\[4a.5\]]ro/_/bdag gi rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad dang rig pa thams cad kyi mchog tu brjod pa'o/_/gal te rig pa gzhan dag gis las mi 'tshal na yang sbyor ba 'dis rig pa thams cad sbyor bar bgyi'o/_/las thams cad bgyid do/_/las bgyid 
[\[4a.6\]]na rig pa'i rgyal po dang lhan cig lan gsum brjod la 'ga' zhig ma mchis na/_de'i mgo dum bu zin thig le'i snyi ma bzhin du 'gas par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe gsang ba pa rnams kyi gsang sngags grub pa de'i tshe las thams cad du rig pa'i mchog bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/
[\[4a.7\]]mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la ba smad spu mthun gyi mar sar blangs te/_/mar sar des seng ldeng gi mer lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na rig pa'i mchog rig pa sgrub pa rnams la dam pa stsol bar 'gyur 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]ro/_/gang gi tshe pha rol 'bros par bgyid 'tshal na phub ma las lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya'o/_/so phag gis kyang 'phangs na 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du a rka'i zhugs bus la rtswa dUr ba'i lo ma can

[\[4b.3\]]rgya mtsho'i dbu ba dang rgya spos dang ldong ros rnams cha bsnyams te rma bya'i mkhris pa dang ril bu sran ma tsam du bgyis te/_lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig pa'i mchog lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis la sbrul gyis zin pa la chu la btab na 'jog pos zin pa yang 'tsho'o/_/srin 
[\[4b.4\]]bus zin pa dang /_bas ldags dang 'bras phreng ba 'gyur ba la chab skol ba las btang ngo /_/sbrum ma bu ma phyin pa la ni mar las btang na bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro/_/bus pa gdon gyis zin na bdug pas bdugs pa gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med kyi nad las ni dar 
[\[4b.5\]]ba la btang ngo /_/phug tu 'jug na lus la bsku'o/_/sgrub pa na bdag la bdugs na log 'dren thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du srad bu la rig pa'i mchog brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis te lag pa la btags nas g.yul ngor zhugs na pha 
[\[4b.6\]]rol gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i thal ba'am/_thal ba gtsang mas kham phor bkang la rig pa mchog bzlas brjod bgyis na rkun po gang na 'dug pa der mchi'o/_/gang gis rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis pa de la dbang phyug chen po 
[\[4b.7\]]dang dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs dang /_bgegs dang log 'dren dang /_/mkha' 'gro ma dang srin po dang /_sha za dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_/'byung po dang /_grul bum dang /_srul po dang /_mdangs 'phrog pa dang /_gdon brgyan ma dang /_ma mo dang lag na rdo rje'i phyag brnyan dang gang gis kyang

[\[5a.1\]]glags mi rnyed kyi lag na rdo rjes de'i mgo 'gems so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga 'am/_phyogs gtsang mar mchod pa bgyis te rtswa ku sha'i mdung rtse gsum pa thogs la yungs kar dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang mar bsregs pa sbyin blugs lan nyi 
[\[5a.2\]]shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyi zhing nyin bdun dus gsum du gcer bur skra bshig la bgyis na nor s+col bar bgyid do/_/mar gyi ngo zhag drug nas brtsams te mtsho 'gram du mchis la/_mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad pa'i bar du yungs kar dag las sbyin sreg lan brgyad stong bgyis na 
[\[5a.3\]]nor dang gos rnams s+col bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog sgrub pa ni ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bri bar bgyi'o/_/g.yas phyogs su lag na rdo rje stan 
[\[5a.4\]]nang tshangs can gyi steng na mchis par bri'o/_/lag na rdo rje'i 'og tu rig pa'i mchog bri'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ni gser gyi kha dog lta bu'o/_/lag na rdo rje ni sngo bsangs te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/rig pa'i rgyal po yang sngo bsangs te rgyan thams cad 
[\[5a.5\]]kyis brgyan la stan gor bu'i steng na mchis par bri'o/_/mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te ci nus su mchod par bgyis la rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis rig pa'i rgyal po dgug par bgyi'o/_/rdo rje'i khas nye reg bgyi'o/_/rdo rje'i lte bas spos 
[\[5a.6\]]dbul bar bgyi'o/_/me kha las me tog dbul bar bgyi'o/_/gdong dkar gyis srung bar bgyi'o/_/rdo rje ser mos khrus bgyi'o/_/nag mos khu ba bcing bar bgyi'o/_/gyen du lta ba'i gdong gis phyogs bcing bar bgyi'o/_/rdo rje'i seng ge'i khris 'dug par 
[\[5a.7\]]bgyi'o/_/rdo rje ldan mas bgegs gzhom par bgyi'o/_/shugs ldan mas slar gshegs su gsol lo/_/phyis rig pa mchog gi ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du gu gul gyi ril bu brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dngos grub kyi mtshan mar bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs

[\[5b.1\]]'gul bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun na ti na ra brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/yang na longs spyod stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du du ru ska'i 'bras bu las lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bgyis na gang 'dod pa de smyo bar 'gyur ro/_/lag na

[\[5b.3\]]bgyi'o/_/dro bar gyur na rkang pas mchi'o/_/du ba 'thul na mi snang ba dang lo bdun stong du 'tsho'o/_/'bar na bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rlung bzhin du lag na rdo rje'i gnas su mchi zhing kha zas ci 'dod pa za'o/_/a tha rA dzA nA ma shi ka dU kA ma kr-i ta aSh+Ta mya a

[\[5b.5\]]'bru las lan brgyad stong du sbyin sreg bgyis na dgra 'chi'o/_/gnod par sems par bgyid na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi shing gi zhugs bus la til nag po la lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na gnod par sems par bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi ngo 
[\[5b.6\]]zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong las bzung la/_de'i ming nas phyung ste bzlas brjod bgyis na 'phral du dgrar mi 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te rig pa mchog gi sngags 
[\[5b.7\]]kyis btab pa'i chang gis rdo rje bkrus la rig sngags kyang lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bgyis na/_gang gi ming nas phyung ste bzlas brjod bgyis pa de gdon gyis zin par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje 'o mas bkrus la rig sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas pa bgyis na sos par 'gyur 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]ro/_/yul 'khor gzhig par 'dod pas seng ldeng gi rdo rje bgyis la yar gyi ngo tshes bcu gnyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis te/_yul gyi bzhi mdor btsugs na yul 'khor 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/phyung na snga ma 
[\[6a.2\]]kho na bzhin rtag par 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi ngo zhag dgu la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig pa mchog gis ske tshe'i 'bru la lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na khyim phung bar 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mar dang bsres pa'i ske tshe'i 'bru la lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg 
[\[6a.3\]]bgyis na brtas par 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la ba smad spu mthun gyi 'o ma blangs te rig pa mchog gi bzlas brjod byed cing bsrungs la/_de las mar sar blangs te thod pa'i nang du bzhag la thod pa de blangs te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba 
[\[6a.4\]]bgyis la mngon mtshan cig yod par song ste/_'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma bgyis la thod pa de thogs te lus kyis lho phyogs su 'dug la ci tsam na 'bar ba de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas de 'thungs na ci 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' 
[\[6a.5\]]la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/gzugs sna tshogs ston par 'gyur ro/_/lo lnga brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog 'di ni rig pa thams cad kyi gtso bo'o/_/bdag bsrung na gos kyi mtha' mar mdud pa dor ro/_/gzhan 
[\[6a.6\]]bsrung na spyi gtsug tu skra mdud dor ro/_/chu srin kum+b+hi ra'i kha bcing na phyogs bzhir chu gtor ro/_/stag la ni yid kyis dkyil 'khor bgyis na bcings par 'gyur ro/_/mtshams bcad na yungs kar gyis so/_/zhing bsrung na phur bu dag gis so/_/sman 
[\[6a.7\]]bsrung na yid kyis rig pa'i mchog sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang bsgrub pa na ma god pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog bri bar bgyi ste/_mdog sngo bsangs sham thabs ser po lag pa g.yon na zhags pa g.yas 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]pas dam pa sbyin par bri'o/_/'og tu sgrub pa po lag na pog phor thogs pa bri'o/_/zhag bdun zas su 'o skyo btung ngo /_/tha mar zhag gsum smyung bar bgyis te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la ci nus kyis mchod pa bgyis la skra tshogs las zhags pa bgyis te/_
[\[6b.2\]]lag pa g.yas par thogs te ji srid du rang gi gzugs kyis mchi ba de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/rdo rje bzhad mas smrar gzhug ste de bu ci bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/_/des tshangs pa'am/_khyab 'jug gam/_dbang phyug chen po dang /_che ge mo zhes bya ba 
[\[6b.3\]]zhags pas zung la khrid de spyon cig ces brjod do/_/yang rgyal po'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_srin po'am/_sha za'am/_gang dgug par 'dod pa de bkug ste/_de dag thams cad phyag brnyan du 'gyur ro/_/gang bsams pa de 'tshal te mchi'o/_/

[\[11a.3\]]brjod bgyis na gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la e raN+Da'i shing gis zhugs bus la ba lang gi pags pa las sreg blugs lan brgyad stong ming nas brjod de sbyin sreg bgyis na ba lang rnams 'chi'o/_/skyes pa'i 
[\[11a.4\]]ro ma snad ma nyams pa blangs te chu 'gram gyi phyogs gcig gam/_skam sa gtsang mar pho nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang nyi ma'i gung tshigs la mi ro'i mgo shar phyogs su bstan te phyogs bzhir bsnyen bkur bgyid pa 
[\[11a.5\]]bzhi bzhag par bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang de'i snying gar 'dug la khar ldong ros bcug ste dngos grub rnam gsum ma thob kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/_/'bar bar gyur na lo stong thub bo/_/rkang pa la bskus na lo lnga brgya thub ste 'di ni dngos grub bo/_/mar 
[\[11a.6\]]gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du pa la sha'i shing gis zhugs bus la shing bil ba'i yam sreg shing zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la smyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi zhing ming nas brjod na phyugs chung rnyed do/_/gal te ma rnyed na 
[\[11a.7\]]phyugs chung 'chi'o/_/dgra gang la nad kyis btab par bgyid 'tshal na ru rta btags la bdag gi lus la dril ba'i dri ma bsags te/_mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du du ru ska'i shing gis zhugs bus la/_dri ma des lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi zhing ming 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]nas brjod na de mdze nad kyis 'debs so/_/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lce pog gis bdug pas bdugs la rig sngags kyang lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na gso ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/yar gyi ngo zhag gcig la rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la zas 
[\[11b.2\]]su chu skyo 'thung zhing zla ba nya'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na yul gru 'thob bo/_/bram ze dbang du bgyi na yar gyi ngo tshes drug nas brgyad kyi bar du dus gsum du lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sna ma'i me tog las lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la tha mar zhag gcig smyung 
[\[11b.3\]]ba bgyis na/_skyes pa'am bud med kyang rung ste dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bil ba'i shing gis zhugs bus la yungs kar gyi 'bru mar dang bsres pa'i til las lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi zhing 
[\[11b.4\]]ming nas brjod na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bud med yugs sa mo dbang du bgyi na nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arka'i shing gis zhugs bus la arka'i me tog mar la smyugs pa lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi zhing ming nas brjod na dbang du 'gyur 
[\[11b.5\]]ro/_/dus gsum du khrus bgyi zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun du shing ma da la'i tsher ma las lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na zhag gsum gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mi ngas 'byung bar 'tshal na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la dur khrod du song ba dur khrod kyi shing gis zhugs bus la dug 
[\[11b.6\]]rlon pas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na mi ngas 'byung ngo /_/zhi bar bgyi na yar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du shing tha mal pa'i zhugs bus la ut+pal dang /_zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la smyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg 
[\[11b.7\]]bgyis na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan bskrad par 'tshal na bya khwa'i gshog pa yungs kar gyi 'bru mar la smyugs pa brgyad stong zhag bdun dus gsum du sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/'di ni bskrad pa'i mchog go/_/dbye ba bgyi na zhag bdun dus gsum du ba lang gi lci ba la 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbye ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/las cig gis cho ga rgyas par sgrub par 'tshal bas mA ma kI thogs la pad ma'i rdzing du song ste/_mA ma kI la reg par pad+ma 'bum phul na rig pa'i rgyal po mchog rang gi gzugs ston 
[\[12a.2\]]te/_/de la bu ci bya zhes smra'o/_/des bcom ldan 'das cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol zhes brjod pa dang de bzhin bya'o zhes brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de cho ga rgyas pa las 'byung ba'i las thams cad dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/_/gal te des las 
[\[12a.3\]]grub par ma gyur na de'i 'og tu las 'di sgrub na dngos grub kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/yar gyi ngo nya nas bzung ste phyi ma'i nya'i bar du mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs kyis zas su 'o skyo 'thung zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[12a.4\]]pa'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur te/_de nas cho ga rgyas pa dang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/_/ras sngon po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te 'og sgor bcings la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i thal bas mgo bor bsrung bar bgyis na gyad phar non cing 
[\[12a.5\]]gyad kyis tshur mi non no/_/yid gzhungs par bgyi na bra ma'i khu ba mar dang cha bsnyams la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis pa 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/yar gyi ngo tshes 
[\[12a.6\]]zhag gcig nas brtsams te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mar dang 'o ma bsres pa las lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pa 'thungs shing zhag bdun bgyis na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/yar gyi ngo nya la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ang 
[\[12a.7\]]go ta'i me tog brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na nyi ma gsum pa la thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun na lag na rdo rje'i kha nas 'od zer 'byung ste rig sngags 'chang la bskor ba byas nas gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang ci ltar 'dod pa'i 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]gzugs can du 'gyur ro/_/lo su ma stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi ngo zhag bcu la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sna ma'i me tog brgyad stong phul na gnas ston par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga rgyas pa sgrub pa pos nya dang sha dang til dang sran chan gyi bag dang lha bshos dang kha 
[\[12b.2\]]'da' dang la phug dang shing thog rnams bza' bar mi bgyi'o/_/gal te 'di dag kyang zos la las kyang bsgrubs na lag na rdo rjes de nyid mthar byed cing las kyang dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ro/_/seng ge bsgrub na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la grog mkhar rtse mo yod pa'i 
[\[12b.3\]]mdun nas sa blangs te ba'i rnam lnga dang bsres la seng ge'i gzugs bgyis te gso sbyong bzung la zla ba gcig zas su 'o skyo 'thung zhing tha mar zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la bsgrub bo/_/sngar pho nya mo rnams kyis las rnams bgyi'o/_/bsnyen 
[\[12b.4\]]bkur bgyis pa rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/de nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas brjod bgyis te seng ge'i sgra 'byin gyi bar du bgyi'o/_/seng ge'i sgra thos nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams 'byung ste de dag la 'dod pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o/_/gal te 'dod pa bskyed 
[\[12b.5\]]na seng ge ni ma mchis so/_/lha ma yin gyi bu rnams ni mchis te lha ma yin gyi bu rnams kyang yongs su spyad par 'gyur ro/_/gal te de dag la 'dod pa ma bskyed na seng ger 'gyur te/_seng ge la zhon na rig sngags 'chang gi bu mo brgyad cu 'byung ngo /_/rig sngags 
[\[12b.6\]]'chang bzhi stong yang g.yog 'khor du 'gyur ro/_/gang du 'dod pa der mchi'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo la sogs pa'i spyod yul du mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang mdung rtse gsum pa dang be con dang /_
[\[12b.7\]]zhags pa dang /_mdung thung dang dbyug to rnams mchi ba de'i tshe seng ges seng ge'i sgra 'byin te seng ge'i sgras mtshon pa thams cad dpag tshad brgyad khrir mchi'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gang dag seng ge'i sgra thos pa de dag thams cad sa la lhung 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]ngo /_/mtshon cha de dag thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bskal par gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba blangs te skam sa gtsang ma'i phyogs 
[\[13a.2\]]su gnod sbyin gyi gzugs bgyis te/_de la me tog dmar po dang gtor ma dmar po sbyin no/_/pho nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o/_/phyogs gcig tu gnod sbyin thams cad la me kha las me tog dkar po rnams stsol to/_/gzugs de'i mdun 
[\[13a.3\]]du arga'i shing gis zhugs bus la shing bil ba'i yam sreg shing zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la smyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/de nas gzugs 'gul zhing dngos grub tu 'gyur te/_nyin re ti na ra re re dbul lo/_/dpon g.yog bdun gyi zas dbul lo/_/
[\[13a.4\]]las 'di bsam par bgyi ste gtsang mar bgyis la lan cig bzlas brjod bgyis te ba nag mo ma smad spu 'thun gyi 'o ma blangs la bram ze'i bu mos bsrubs pa'i mar blangs te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum du smyung ba bgyis te/_mtshan cig yod pa'am lag 
[\[13a.5\]]na rdo rje'i mdun du song la shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma bdun blangs te de dag gi steng du gnod sbyin gyi gzugs mthe bong gi cha tsam zhig bgyi ste/_de nas 'gul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas so la ma reg par mid do/_/de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te de nyin re 
[\[13a.6\]]ti na ra re re dbul lo/_/dpon g.yog bcu gnyis kyi zan dbul lo/_/'di ni dngos grub bo/_/rig sngags gang gzhan la byin pa'i rig sngags de phyi dro bzlas brjod bgyis la/_phyi de nyin rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig bzlas brjod bgyis na de la 
[\[13a.7\]]tshigs su bcad par 'gyur gyi gsang sngags su mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge bzhi pa ni bskal pa bzhir gnas pa lags so/_/bcom 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che ba/_dbang che ba/_ma rungs pa/_gtum pa drag po lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ming brjod pas bdag la gnod pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la 'di skad ces 
[\[13b.2\]]bka' stsal to/_/'byung po'i bdag po de de bzhin te/_ci skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/'byung po'i bdag po rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rig pa mchog 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o/_/'byung po'i bdag po rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di ni 'gro lding ba'i gzugs can 
[\[13b.3\]]'gro lding gi skad du brjod pa'o/_/'byung po'i bdag po rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'i mchog 'di ni phyag 'tshal ba dang bcas par yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o/_/yi ge bzhi pa 'di yang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mtshungs pa med pa ste/_bskal pa bzhir gnas 
[\[13b.4\]]pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad nas bzung ste bshad pa'o/_/'byung po'i bdag po 'di thos na sems can gang dag mtshams med pa lnga byed pa de dag kyang sems can dmyal ba chen por mnar med par skye ba de ni gnas ma yin 
[\[13b.5\]]zhing go skabs med de/_rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rig pa mchog gi mthu ni 'di yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che chen po'i rgyal po gtsug tor ldan zhes bya ba mthong ba tsam gyis nad thams cad med par 'gyur zhing gdon thams cad kyang 'bros par 
[\[13b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/'byung po'i bdag po de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gang gis bzlas brjod byas pa de mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur te/_dug gis ma yin/_chu yis ma yin/_mes ma yin zhing de bar ma dor 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ngan 
[\[13b.7\]]'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nges par rdo rje'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te spyan sngar 'dug nas mgo btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rig pa'i rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje 'di skad du rig pa'i rgyal po mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mtshungs pa med pa 'di bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad nas bzung ste bshad do zhes gsung /_
[\[14a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis mA ma kI'i de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba yang rjes su dran no/_/rdo rje 'chang chen po 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi gsung rab la lha rnams la mA ma kI bstan te/_'khor 'dus pa 
[\[14a.3\]]der mtshams med pa bgyis pa'i sems can gcig cig ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na mchis pa de 'od zer gyi snang ba de mthong nas yid dga' bar gyur te rnam par bltas nas rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi rgyal po rdo rje phreng ba zhes bgyi bar gyur te/_shA ri'i bus 
[\[14a.4\]]rig sngags 'chang de la bsams so/_/des bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_de dang shA ri'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du mA ma kI de ltar 
[\[14a.5\]]rdzu 'phrul che'o zhes bdag mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/shA ri'i bu don de rdo rje 'chang chen po la dris shig_/de nas shA ri'i bus rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rig pa'i rgyal po mchog khyod ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[14a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad nas bzung ste/_bdag gis rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di bshad ces de skad smra/_rdo rje 'chang chen pos 'di skad ces smras so/_/shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_ci de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo yin nam/_shes 
[\[14a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtso bo yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtso bo yin nam/_de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo yin zhe na/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]pa las byung la/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad do/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du bdag gis kyang rig pa'i rgyal po chen po mchog gi snying po la byas la/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sgron ma chen 
[\[14b.2\]]po'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i mthus mA ma kI phyag rgya chen po'i rgyal mo chen mo de thob bo/_/de nas shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la bka' stsal pa/_'byung po'i bdag po gang gis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[14b.3\]]pa 'bum phrag gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed la phyag byas pa bas gang gis rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'i mchog lag na rdo rje la yid kyis phyag byas pa de ni de nyid las bsod nams mang du bskyed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa dri ma 
[\[14b.4\]]med pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'dis ci srid cig nas rig pa'i rgyal po chen po dang /_rig sngags 'chang gi bdag por 
[\[14b.5\]]bskos pa thob ste/_'di ting nge 'dzin gang gis gnas 'di'i sngon gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni su lags/_'di gnas pa gang gis gnas/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces 
[\[14b.6\]]bka' stsal to/_/rtogs pa dri ma med pa sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa gang gA'i klung bcu dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na gdul dka' zhes bya ba'i bskal pa chen po byung ste/_bskal pa chen po de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[14b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes sgron ma chen mo'i 'od zer zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rdo rje ldan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]pa ye shes sgron ma chen po'i 'od zer de ni byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu la mun nag rnam par sel ba rnam par snang byed ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'chad do/_/rdo rje 'chang 
[\[15a.2\]]gi rigs 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam dpag tu med pa nas 'dus pa 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i rdul phra rab snyed la ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi bsngags pa dpag tu med pa bstan pa'i phyir 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas rdo rje 'chang chen 
[\[15a.3\]]po rdo rje chen po'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa 'jig rten mtha' yas pa'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor du 'dus pa de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa de stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom 
[\[15a.4\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas yar langs te/_tog yangs pa chen po rab 'byam gyi 'og gi phyogs nas phyag rgya chen po bsgyur nas rdo rje blangs te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho rnam pa bcu yang dag par bskul 
[\[15a.5\]]nas de dag gis rgyal po bsgyings par bsgyur bas rgya mtsho chen po bsdu ba'i tshul gyi nga rgyal chen po des rdo rje gsor nas dus kyi tha ma 'jig pa'i me lta bu'i mig gis 'dzums pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'og gi phyogs kyi phyag rgya bsgyur bas rdo rje de de bzhin 
[\[15a.6\]]gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du bzhag ste/_/zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de zhus pa/_de ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor 'dus pa la 'dzum pa bstan/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[15a.7\]]kyi zhal gyi sgo dang smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sngon ma byung ba'i 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs byung /_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du 'khor 'dis bskul nas bdag bcom ldan 'das la zhu zhing mchis na thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dang byang chub sems 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]dpa'i tshogs 'di la thugs brtse ba'i slad du de bka' stsal du gsol/_rdo rje bsgyings pa chen po 'jig rten mtha' yas pa'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po lag na rdo rjes de skad zhus pa dang /_de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan dpal gyi be'u chen po las mthon ka chen 
[\[15b.2\]]po dang /_bai DUr+ya lta bu 'od zer nor bu rin po che chen po skar mdog lta bu'i 'od dang ldan pa 'od zer chen po'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam mtha' yas par cher snang ba'i 'od zer gyi me lce byung nas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba'i dkyil 
[\[15b.3\]]'khor las lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje blangs pa las gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rig pa'i rgyal po chen po byung ngo /_/lcags kyu'i mtshan las ni lcags kyu/_nyas ni 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma/_bkra shis las ni lu gu rgyud/_g.yung drung 'khyil pa mchog tu 
[\[15b.4\]]mdzes shing me 'bar ba lta bu las ni me kha la/_bya ma bum las ni ser mo/_gdugs las ni rgyal mtshan drag po/_rdo rje las ni dga' ba ste/_rgyal mo chen mo pho nya mo dang 'khor du bcas pa bdun po de dag byung ngo /_/de dag gi mdun du ma rungs pa khro bo'i 
[\[15b.5\]]gzugs stobs po che dang /_khro bo kI li kI li dus kyi tha ma'i rin po che lta bu rdo rje khu tshur las byung ngo /_/lag ngar las ni khu tshur ro/_/phrag pa 'bar zhing mdzes pa las ni rdo rje gnam lcags te/_de ltar 'khor dang bcas pa'i pho nya mo bcu'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[15b.6\]]du drug cu phrag bzhir bsgre'o/_/rtogs pa dri ma med pa 'di lta ste/_lag na rdo rje g.yog 'khor dang bcas shing pho nya mo dang 'khor dang bcas pa byung nas dam tshig chen po dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sgron ma chen 
[\[15b.7\]]po'i 'od zer las des de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis gsol ba btab pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/_thog mar de bzhin gshegs pas sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba bcu 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]dang /_gsang ba mtha' yas dkrigs phrag bye ba dang ldan pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor dam tshig can 'dus pa'i 
[\[16a.2\]]dkyil 'khor du bshad do/_/rtogs pa dri ma med pa de tshun chad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sgron ma chen po'i 'od zer de la sogs pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gam du bdud pham par mdzad nas bstan pa kun tu bsrung bar gyur to/_/

[\[16a.6\]]pham par byas te bstan pa kun tu bsrungs par gyur to/_/de'i 'og tu der bskal pa stong snyed 'das nas lag na rdo rje 'di de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gsang ba 'dzin pa dang bstan pa bsrung bar gyur to/_/de bzhin du sbyar te tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug

[\[16b.1\]]bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed de/_bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed pa thams cad la de bzhin du mthar gyis thabs 'dis bstan pa la

[\[17a.1\]]de'i 'og tu zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis la/_gnas bzhir bsnyen bkur byed pa bzhi bzhag go/_/pho nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o/_/ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar rtswa ku sha sbams pa'i steng du 'dug la/_mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la gtor

[\[20b.1\]]gcig smyung ba bgyis te/_/dur khrod du mchis la mgal ba blangs te/_/dri dang /_me tog dang bdug pas brgyan pa bgyis la rig pa dpag tu ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis na dgung phyed kyi dus na log 'dren rnams mchi ste/_/de dag la rdo rje lte bas

[\[20b.4\]]'tshal na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la grog mkhar rtse'i mdun gyi dog sa blangs la gzugs bgyis te/_/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du thab khung bgyis la thab khung gi nang du dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci bas zhugs bus te zhugs kyi nang du gzugs stsal la de'i steng du lan tshwa'i sbyin

[\[21a.1\]]sngags 'chang gis nor bsgrub pa dang /_las byang bar bgyi bar 'tshal na ba lang gi lhas su mchis la mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas brtsams te zas su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rig pa'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i gdugs kyi gung la ce spyang mo sgra 'byin te/_

[\[25b.1\]]lag na rdo rje la skyabs su dong ngo /_/log 'dren rnams kyang 'gul ma nus nas yid kyis lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po khyed 
[\[25b.2\]]longs shig nga'i dam tshig la yang dag par gnas par gyis shig_/de thos nas lha rnams rab tu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lag 
[\[25b.3\]]na rdo rje 'di ni mchog tu mi bzad pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha dag de de bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig pa 'di ni lha rnams 'chi 'pho bar bgyid pa/_gnod 
[\[25b.4\]]sbyin rnams phung bar bgyid pa/_/dri za rnams lhung bar bgyid pa/_log 'dren rnams nges par brlag par bgyid pa/_rdo rje'i rigs thams cad skrag par bgyid pa/_tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa la gnod par bgyid pa lags

[\[25b.6\]]bgyid pa dang /_phur bus gdab par bgyid par 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te/_ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba las brgya byin gyi gzugs bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzhag ste/_de'i steng du shing kun gyi shing gis

[\[26a.3\]]pa mchog des rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang bdun stong gis bdag po bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyang g.yos par bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyang phung bar bgyid par 'tshal

[\[26a.6\]]par 'tshal bas rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi ngos su yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/_kham po dza'i shing gis zhugs bus la yungs kar mar dang bsres pas lan khrir sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gzugs can gyi mi

[\[27b.6\]]tu 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams mi 'phrogs par brjod par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po smros shig_/bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang gis lig bu mig dang ldong ros la sogs pa sgrub na thog mar 'o mas bkru bar bgyi ste/_bkrus pas dngos grub

[\[28a.6\]]par bgyi'o/_/gal te rig sngags ma grub na de nyid du mchis la du ba ma mchis pa'i me mdag tu ske tshe las lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na rig pa de nyams par gyur nas de'i mdun du mchi ste dngos grub tu stsol to/_/de nyid du mchis la rig sngags 'chang gis

[\[28b.1\]]bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/_dpag tu ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis na gnod sbyin mo mchi bar 'gyur te/_rdo rje bzhad mas smrar stsal bar bgyi'o/_/gang gi tshe ngas che ge mo zhes bya ba la rgyob shig rgyob shig_/sregs shig sregs shig_/

[\[29a.5\]]pa rgya cher bgyis la nag mo drag mo mchi bar 'gyur gyis bar du rig pa bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/mchis pa dang rig pa mchog gis mchod yon dbul lo/_/de nas de rig sngags 'dzin ci sbyin par bya zhes mchi ba dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rgyal po bgyid du stsol

[\[29b.1\]]brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dbab par bgyi na chab bam bye'u rug pa'i lo mas bgyi'o/_/gdon bcing ngam bskyod par bgyi na gu gul gyis bgyi'o/_/dur khrod kyi thal ba la gzugs bgyis la lan gsum bzlas brjod byas pas gdon gyis gtong bar

[\[29b.4\]]brjod bgyis na ti na ra cig stsol to/_/sgrub pa bgyi na ma god pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gser gyi mdog can bri bar bgyi'o/_/de'i g.yon rol tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bgyi'o/_/de'i g.yas rol tu 'phags pa 
[\[29b.5\]]lag na rdo rje bri bar bya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i kha dog ltar dkar po'o/_/lag na rdo rje ni sngo bsangs te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/lag na rdo rje'i g.yas rol tu ni rgyal ba ldan ma sngo bsangs la de yang rgyan thams 
[\[29b.6\]]cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/de'i 'og rol tu ni sgrub pa po lag na pog phor thogs pa bri'o/_/de nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la gu gul gyis bdug pa sreg cing /_ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun 
[\[29b.7\]]du zhugs bus la ka ra bI ra'i me tog dang zho dang sbrang rtsi mar la smyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/de nas me thab nas ka ra bI ra'i me tog pad+ma'i tshad tsam du 'byung ngo /_/ka ra bI ra'i pad+ma'i dbus na ka ra bI ra 'dra ba'i ldong ros 'byung ste/_rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]brjod bgyid bzhin du de blang bar bgyi'o/_/blangs pa tsam gyis gdugs shar ba'i mdog lta bu dang /_skra lcang lo 'khyil ba dang lo bcu drug lon pa'i lus lta bur 'gyur/_lo brgyad khri thub par 'gyur/_nam mkha' la mchi ba dang mnyam pa ma mchis

[\[30a.3\]]yar gyi ngo zla ba nya ba la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/_mchod pa bgyis la me tog dri zhim po las brgya stong phul na kAr ShA pa Na lnga stsal to/_/dgra bskrad par 'tshal na yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la dur khrod kyi gnas su zhugs bus la dur khrod kyi thal bas sbyin

[\[30a.5\]]rdo rje'i mdun du til gyis lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o/_/dbye bar bgyi na yar gyi ngo tshes lnga la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/_lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mon sran gre'u las lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbye ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/tshes grangs dang skar 
[\[30a.6\]]ma 'dam mi 'tshal/_smyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal te/_lag na rdo rje'i mdun du gdugs bdun dus gsum du ba ru ra brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na phyugs chung rnyed do/_/bud med dbang du bgyid na gdugs bdun dus gsum du mon sran gre'u las sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/skyes 
[\[30a.7\]]pa dbang du bgyid na mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la til las lan brgya stong bgyis na skyes pa dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rA dzA ma te ba shI ka ra mai shikla pra ti ba d+ha maM b+he badzra pA Nir+g+h+ra ta ar+k+ka aste rag+niM pa dz+wa l+ya shwe ta sar sha pa 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]na~M aSh+Ta sa ha sraM dzu hu yang+Ya bad asta mi ti ba sha/_rgyal ba ldan pa'i cho ga rdzogs so//_//rdo rje lcags sgrog gi las rnams lags te/_rig sngags bcings na srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la mdud pa dor ro/_/yungs kar 
[\[30b.2\]]gyis ni zhugs kyi ra bar 'gyur ro/_/chab kyis ni yul gru chen por 'gyur ro/_/thal bas ni rdo rje ra bar 'gyur ro/_/bcing ba thams cad rdo rje lcags sgrog 'di nyid sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/gang dag bdag gi rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa la dam tshig mthong nas 'jig 
[\[30b.3\]]rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig sngags sgrub pa de dag la gang dag bgegs bgyid dam/_rdzas 'phrog pa de dag ni dam tshig ma 'tshal cing rigs la 'khu ba lags te/_de dag ma rung bar bgyi ba'i slad du las 'di brtsam par bgyi'o/_/tsan dan dmar 
[\[30b.4\]]po las lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bgyis te mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du seng ldeng shing gis zhugs bus la/_sha chen po sreg blugs lan bdun sbyin sreg bgyis te de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces lha'am/_gnod sbyin 
[\[30b.5\]]nam/_grub pa'am/_rig sngags 'chang ngam/_log 'dren nam/_log 'dren gyi g.yog 'khor ram/_grul bum mam/_'byung po'am/_sha za'am/_gang gis bdag gi rdzas ji ltar khyer ba des slar byin cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/de skad thos nas 
[\[30b.6\]]gal te des stsal na ni cang mi bgyi'o/_/gal te ma stsal na yang 'di skad bsgrag par bgyi ste/_gang gis bdag gi rdzas khyer ba des slar byin cig ces bgyi'o/_/ci ste ma stsal na lag na rdo rje'i rigs las phyi rol pa lag na rdo rje'i rigs la 'khu ba lags pas 
[\[30b.7\]]bya gag gi rtug pa blangs la yang lan gsum brjod par bgyi'o/_/de ltar bgyis kyang ma stsal na bya gag gi rtug pa lag na rdo rje la bdug cing rig sngags kyang lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas lag na rdo rje'i rigs la 'khu ba des kyi hud kyi hud ces 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]mchi la tshig cing sa phyogs der lhung ngo /_/mig kyang 'jar ro/_/'gum par yang 'gyur ro/_/de'i rigs rabs chad par 'gyur ro/_/nor ni slar khugs par 'gyur ro/_/bsad par ni mi bgyi'o/_/gdon gyi las rnams kyang bgyi ste/_
[\[31a.2\]]sa zin pa'am/_ma zin pa yang rung ste/_yid kyis dbab par bgyi'o/_/bye'u rug pa'i lo ma'am/_sra ci pog gam/_chab kyis dug las gso bar bgyi'o/_/bdag gso zhing mdze nad ma mchis par bgyi na dog sa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 
[\[31a.3\]]bgyis la bsku bar bgyi'o/_nad kr-i ta si ma mchis par bgyi na srad bu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la gang na nad kr-i ta si mchis pa der bcing bar bgyi'o/_/mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/_/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du 
[\[31a.4\]]bil ba'i shing gis zhugs bus la bal ba'i yam sreg shing khri sbyin sreg bgyis na longs spyod dag s+col lo/_/yar gyi ngo nya la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du a pa marga'i yam sreg shing khri rig pa mchog dang lhan cig pas sbyin sreg 
[\[31a.5\]]bgyis na rdo rje lcags sgrog mthong zhing gang blangs pa de stsol lo/_/rdo rje lcags sgrog gi cho ga rdzogs so//_//rdo rje ser mo'i las rnams lags te/_gdon babs pa gtong bar bgyi na chab kyis bgyi'o/_/'dar bar bgyi na mdzub mo la lan bdun 
[\[31a.6\]]bzlas brjod bgyis te bstan na 'dar ro/_/gdon rnam par gzhom na yid kyis lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/chab kyis ni rengs par bgyid do/_/rig pas bcings pa las sgrol na rdo rje ser mo'i sngags lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te song shig song shig ces 
[\[31a.7\]]brjod na grol bar 'gyur ro/_/bcings pa dgrol na lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis pas dgrol lo/_/rkang rdul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas thig le bgyis na gang bsams pa de rnyed do/_/mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]te/_n+ya gro d+ha gcig pu mchis par mchis la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/_n+ya gro d+ha'i drung du mchis la/_sh+le sh+me ta ka'i lo ma dag gis steng du rtswa dUr ba'i lo ma bzhag ste/_'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/'bar nas mgo bor bzhag na de me tog gi phreng 
[\[31b.2\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de mgo la bcings na dpag tshad stong du gyen la 'phag go/_/lo khri nyis stong thub bo/_/zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ras dkar po bzhag la 'bar gyi bar la bzlas brjod bgyis na blangs pa tsam 
[\[31b.3\]]gyis gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog can du 'gyur ro/_/lo nyis stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje ser mo'i cho ga rdzogs so//_//shugs ldan ma'i las rnams lags te/_/gdon tshar gcad na dur khrod kyi sol bas gzugs bris la/_lan gsum 
[\[31b.4\]]bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i lcug mas gzhus na gdon gyis gtong ngo /_/skra las bgyis pa'i srad bu gtun shing gis brdungs na gdon du zhing gtong ngo /_/gzegs ma las sbyin sreg bgyis na gdon gyi yan lag tshig par 'gyur ro/_/ba lang gi lci ba las 
[\[31b.5\]]gzugs bgyis la/_lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thur mas mig phyung na zhar bar 'gyur ro/_/lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i gseg mas shing ljon pa la bsnun na 'pho bar 'gyur ro/_/dbab na me tog gis bgyi'o/_/dgrol na yid kyis so/_/
[\[31b.6\]]'di dag la sogs pa ni gdon gyi las rnams lags so/_/bsrung ba ni lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thal bas bgyi'o/_/yul gru bsrung ba ni lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o/_/bskrad pa ni yungs kar gyis bgyi'o/_/
[\[31b.7\]]nangs par langs te shugs ldan ma'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med dbang du bya na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas brtsams te dgung bdun dus gsum du lung thang gi shing gis zhugs bus la/_til gyi sreg blugs 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rA dz+nyA na ba ma shi ka tu ka ma kr-iSh+Na sra a b+ha mi ma a ho ra tro shi te na badzra pA Ni ra g+hu ta ti la ka shwe rak+niM pra dz+wA l+ya ru d+hi ra ak+ta naM rA dzi ka naM aSh+Ta sa ha sraM dzu hU yAM bA sho b+ha ba ti/_rgya mtshor 'bab 
[\[32a.2\]]pa'i chu ngogs gnyis ka'i sa blangs la za ma tog bgyis te/_za ma tog der lig bu mig stsal la za ma tog kyang mi thod kha sbyar gyi nang du stsal te/_mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas dgung gsum smyung ba bgyis te mtshan gcig mchis par mchis la lho phyogs su mchis 
[\[32a.3\]]te mi thod thogs la 'bar gyi bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/'bar nas blangs te rig pa mchog gis bsrung ba bgyis te/_lig bu mig gcig la btab ste/_lig bu mig de 'o ma dang lhan cig 'tshal na 'tshal ba tsam gyis skra lcang lo 'khyil bar 'gyur/_/mdog 
[\[32a.4\]]ut+pa la'i kha dog lta bur 'gyur/_mtshon gang dag 'phangs pa de dag phye mar lhags par 'gyur/_lo drug khri thub par 'gyur/_dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams grogs su 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/_lag 
[\[32a.5\]]na rdo rje'i mdun du byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la me tog ut+pa la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la smyugs pa brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na yul rnyed do/_/'byung po thams cad dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo zhag gsum du smyung ba byas te/_dur khrod du 
[\[32a.6\]]mchis la pri yang ku'i shing gis zhugs bus te mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na 'byung po thams cad mchi bar 'gyur te/_de dag la phyag brnyan gyis shig ces brjod na gang dang gang du bskos pa de dag thams cad bgyid do/_/yar gyi ngo tshes lnga la nyin 
[\[32a.7\]]zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/_lag na rdo rje'i mdun du a ti muk+ta ka'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad phul na longs spyod rnams stsol te/_/shugs ldan ma'i cho ga rdzogs so//_//rdo rje gdong gi las rnams lags te/_lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]pa'i bum pas gdugs bdun khrus bgyis na sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/byis pa gang dag gdon gyis zin pa de khrus bgyis na gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/gdon gyis zin pa rnams la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i bdug pas 
[\[32b.2\]]bdugs na gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag nam gru dang /_srul po dang /_gdon brnyan mas zin pa de dag tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la mdud pa bdun bor te/_lag pa la bcings na gtong ngo /_/dug las gso na yal gas bgyi'o/_/srin bu ti kas zin pa 
[\[32b.3\]]dang /_nad tsi lu ta dang rkang shu byung ba la sa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te bskus na lan gsum gyi tha ma la sos par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya gzhig na chab kyis bgyi'o/_/dbyig dug bsal bar bgyi na chab kyis rkang lag bkrus la snod du stsal 
[\[32b.4\]]te de nas rtswa ku shas byabs na 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gdon spo na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thal bas bgyi'o/_/nad tsi lu ma mchis par bgyi na mtshon rnon pos sa shur gyis dras la yang rked du bcad na tsi lu ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/nad bri ha ma 
[\[32b.5\]]mchis par bgyi ba yang de bzhin no/_/'dzer pa ma mchis par bgyi na sa la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o/_/mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa ci nus su bgyis la/_gi wang ras dkar 
[\[32b.6\]]po'i steng du bzhag la 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/'bar nas blangs par bgyis te/_blangs nas thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur/_'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba gcig slong mo pa'i zas 'tshal zhing tha 
[\[32b.7\]]mar zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis la/_mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/_shu dag 'chang bar bcangs la sbrul du gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi zhing /_des mi 'jigs par bgyi'o/_/slar yang shu dag tu gyur 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas de bza' bar bgyi ste/_'tshal ba tsam gyis gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog can du 'gyur zhing lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la lha chen po gnas su mchis la nyin zhag 
[\[33a.2\]]gcig smyung ba bgyis la/_lha chen po gzhogs g.yas par lig bu mig a shwat+tha'i lo ma'i steng du bzhag ste/_du ba 'thul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas lig bu mig blangs te/_lha'i skal ba bzhag la mig la bskus na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/_/lo 
[\[33a.3\]]bdun stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/arka'i me tog dur khrod kyi mes bsregs nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis nas lha chen po'i gnas su mchis la/_shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma'i steng du bzhag ste lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la thig le 
[\[33a.4\]]bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/_/lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba gcig 'o skyo 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la mi'i rus pa zla gam lta bur bgyis la de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du lag na rdo rje'i 
[\[33a.5\]]gzugs dang /_dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs bzhag la rig sngags 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das dang /_lag na rdo rje dang /_dbang phyug chen po la rgya cher mchod de/_rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la zla gam 
[\[33a.6\]]blangs te ras dkar po'i steng du bzhag la 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/'bar nas blangs te mgo bor bzhag na ci 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje dang dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su yang bsgyur/_yid kyis gang bsams pa de 
[\[33a.7\]]thams cad kyang 'grub bo/_/lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i dus kyang 'tshal to/_/zas su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sh+le sh+me ta ka'i shing gis zhugs bus la/_a pa marga'i yam sreg shing 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na rgyal po nyid 'thob 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]bo/_/rdo rje gdong gi cho ga rdzogs so//_//rdo rje lte ba'i las rnams lags te/_ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa lag na rdo rje mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_dar 
[\[33b.2\]]ram ras kyi sham thabs can bri bar bya'o/_/de'i g.yas rol tu rdo rje'i lte ba gser gyi mdog can lta bu bri bar bgyis te/_de yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang zas su 'o skyo 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/mar gyi ngo zhag bcu 
[\[33b.3\]]bzhi nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te/_ci nus kyis mchod pa bgyis la tsan dan dmar po mtho gang la rdo rje bgyis te/_rdo rje'i rked par ldong ros bzhag la byang chub kyi shing gi lo mas g.yogs te dngos grub rnam gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/'bar 
[\[33b.4\]]bar gyur na bskal par gnas shing rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad stong gyen du 'phag cing de'i mod la slar mchi'o/_/gang gi tshe 'gum pa de'i tshe lag na rdo rje'i rigs su skye'o/_/ci ste du ba 'thul nas blangs te thig le 
[\[33b.5\]]bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur/_lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu'i gzugs su 'gyur/_lo bdun stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/dro bar gyur nas blangs la thig ler bgyis pa na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur te/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa yang dbang du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[33b.6\]]zla ba gcig zas su chu grog 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/_ba lang gi lhas sam/_kun dga' ra ba'am/_yang na gnas gtsang mar mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la ldong ros til gyi lo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag ste/_gdol pa'i bu 
[\[33b.7\]]mo'i mo mtshan nam/_'dzi ba las bgyis pa'i mo mtshan gyi steng du bzhag par bgyi zhing gdol pa'i bu mo ral gri thogs pa bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag par bgyis la/_de nas rig sngags 'chang gi dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/'bar 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]bar gyur na gdugs shar ba 'dra ba'i mdog tu 'gyur/_skra lcang lo 'khyil par 'gyur/_lo bcu drug lon pa ltu bur 'gyur/_'og tu dpag tshad stong du mchi bar 'gyur/_steng du yang de bzhin mchi bar 'gyur/_dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi 
[\[34a.2\]]thos shing mthong bar 'gyur/_lo khri nyis stong 'tsho bar 'gyur/_nam mkha' la rlung gi shugs dang mtshungs par 'gyur/_grub pa thams cad kyang 'dis dbang du 'gyur/_tshes grangs dang skar ma 'dam mi 'tshal/_smyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal te/_bud med kyi ro blangs 
[\[34a.3\]]la lig bu mig de mo mtshan gyi steng du bzhag ste/_mar gyi do zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis te/_lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la lig bu mig de blangs te/_mig la bskus na mi gda' bar 'gyur/_lo 
[\[34a.4\]]bdun stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te gdol pa'i khyim nas zhugs blangs la seng ldeng gi shing gis zhugs bus te/_dug dang khrag bsres pa'i yungs kar gyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na gang gis ming nas 
[\[34a.5\]]smos te/_sbyin sreg bgyis pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi ngo zhag bcu gnyis la mi rus kyi thur mas blangs te lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis la dgra'i khyim sgor btsugs na dgung gsum gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje lte ba'i cho ga rdzogs so//_//
[\[34a.6\]]me kha la'i las rnams lags te/_bsrung ba bgyid na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i srad bus lag pa la bcing bar bya'o/_/yul gru bsrung na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o/_/dpa' na bye'u rug pa'i lo ma'am/_rma bya'i 
[\[34a.7\]]mdongs kyis bgyi'o/_/gdon la gnod pa bgyi na chab kyis bgyi'o/_/khyim mam lha khang ngam/_kun dga'i ra bar mchis la gang du bzlas brjod bgyis pa de nas 'byung po dang gdon thams cad 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/gdon tshar bcad na khrag gis gzugs bris 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]la rkang pas mnan te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na gdon gyi rigs phung bar 'gyur ro/_/rig pa sgrub na thog ma nyid las 'di bgyis te/_lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sh+le sh+me ta ka'i shing gis zhugs bus la ku ru ba'i me tog brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na lha des 
[\[34b.2\]]rig pa'i lha bzung nas khrid de mchi'o/_/khrid de mchis nas myur du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/_/ci ste log 'dren rnams kyi rigs bsgrub par 'tshal na/_log 'dren rnams kyi log 'dren gyi rigs ni bzhi mchis te/_so gcig pa'i rigs dang /_kam po dza'i rigs 
[\[34b.3\]]dang /_rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs dang /_phung byed kyi rigs so/_/so gcig pa'i rigs la gtsug phud 'phyang la sogs pa log 'dren brgyad khri mchis te/_de dag ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bgegs bgyid do/_/kam po dza'i rigs 
[\[34b.4\]]la ni dbang phyug chen po'i g.yog 'khor ba lang rna ba la sogs pa la bgegs drug khri mchis te/_dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa la bgegs bgyid cing rig pa yang 'joms par bgyid do/_/rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs la ni 'jig rten skyong ba'i g.yog 'khor 
[\[34b.5\]]mya ngan med pa la sogs pa log 'dren drug khri mchis te/_de dag kyang dbang phyug chen po dang phur bu gsum pa'i cho ga rgyas pa la bgegs bgyid do/_/phung byed kyi rigs la ni lag na rdo rje'i g.yog 'khor mu rda ta ka la sogs pa'i log 'dren bye ba phrag 'bum mchis 
[\[34b.6\]]te/_de dag ni rig pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad la bgegs bgyid cing /_rig pa yang 'joms par bgyid do/_/'di ni log 'dren de dag gis bsgrub pa lags te/_so gcig pa'i rigs kyi sgrub pa ni mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te 
[\[34b.7\]]lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dur khrod kyi shing gis zhugs bus la ba lang gi mkhris pas sbas pa'i yungs kar la lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na kyi hud kyi hud ces mchi ba'i sgra grag cing grub par 'gyur te/_grub nas kyang sgrub pa la bgegs mi bgyid do/_/bde bar bsgrub 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]tu mchis so/_/kam po dza'i rigs kyi sgrub pa ni mar gyi ngo zhag lnga la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/_lag na rdo rje dang dbang phyug chen po la mchod pa bgyis nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arka'i shing gis zhugs bus la mon sran gre'u dang mar 
[\[35a.2\]]bsres pa la lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na/_lag na rdo rje'i gzugs 'gul te de nas grub par 'gyur ro/_/grub nas kyang dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa bklags pa tsam gyis rig pa thams cad 'grub bo/_/rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs kyi sgrub

[\[58b.6\]]kyang smras na/_ngu 'bod kyi sgra chen po phyung nas med par 'gyur te/_gsang sngags kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/me'i phyogs kyi cho ga rdzogs so//_//rig sngags 'chang rig sngags bsgrub pa na ci ste rlung gi phyogs nas srod la bgegs kyi gzugs 
[\[58b.7\]]dag 'byung ste/_dngos grub phal sgrub pa na rlung gi phyogs kyi rgyal po'i g.yog mo so sgo ma zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de yang bgegs byed de/_mar me gsod cing lha bshos sme bas 'bags par byed do/_/de phyir gzhil bar bya ba ni rlung gi phyogs kyi gzugs 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]la lan bdun bsngags pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun na bgegs rnams med par 'gyur ro/_/dngos grub chen po sgrub pa na rlung gi phyogs kyi rgyal po'i g.yog gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po drug khri'i bdag po zhig yod de tshub ma gcig 
[\[59a.2\]]pa zhes bya ba de yang rig sngags 'chang de la 'jing gi thun la bgegs byed do/_/tshub ma gcig pa de yang 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can yin te/_ched 'ga' ni wa'i gzugs/_ched 'ga' ni stag gi gzugs/_ched 'ga' ni khyu mchog 
[\[59a.3\]]gi gzugs/_gzugs sna tshogs su bdag nyid ston par byed cing /_ched 'ga' ni hA hA zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin cing skar mda' brgya dag ltung bar byed/_gnam yang 'grum par byed do/_/de la rig sngags 'chang gis rlung gi phyogs kyi gzugs la lan 
[\[59a.4\]]bdun bsngags pa'i thal bas bsnun na bgegs rnams med par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i sgo dpon ma lcags kyu dkar mo can zhes bya ba mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che la bgegs byed pa chen mo zhig yod de/_de yang gsang sngags kyis bzlog par mi nus te/_
[\[59a.5\]]de ni nam gung gi thun la 'ong ngo /_/de 'ong ba dang dus ma yin pa'i char 'bab cing 'brug kyang di ri ri sgrogs/_gnam yang 'grum par byed de/_lcags kyu dkar mo can de yang mdog dkar zhing gzugs kyi lus bstan pas kyang dkyil 'khor 'jig 
[\[59a.6\]]par byed do/_/de la rig sngags 'chang gis myur du lan bdun bsngags te seng ldeng gi phur bu sor bzhi pas rlung gi phyogs kyi gzugs la btab ste/_lcags kyu dkar mo can bcom mo zhes kyang smras na ngu 'bod kyi sgra chen po phyung nas med par 'gyur 
[\[59a.7\]]te/_gsang sngags kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rlung gi phyogs kyi cho ga rdzogs so//_//rig sngags 'chang rig sngags bsgrub pa na chu lha'i phyogs nas bgegs rnams 'byung ste/_dngos grub phal sgrub pa na chu lha'i rgyal po'i g.yog mo klu 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]mo rgyal ba mo zhes bya ba zhig yod de rgyal ba mo de yang srod la bgegs byed do/_/thog tu 'ong la khog skam 'dor bar byed cing pha gu 'phen par byed do/_/de la rig sngags 'chang gis chu'i phyogs kyi gzugs la lan bdun bsngags pa'i yungs kar gyis 
[\[59b.2\]]bsnun na med par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po de'i g.yog klu mo so brtsegs zhes bya ba mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba klu sum khri'i bdag po zhig yod de/_so brtsegs de yang rig sngags 'chang de la 'jing gi thun la bgegs byed sna tshogs rnam pa mang po byed do/_/
[\[59b.3\]]so brtsegs de dur khrod du skyes pa thams cad kyi cha lugs dag tu snang zhing kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu pa lta bu'i bgegs kyi cha lugs dag tu snang ste/_de yang ngu 'bod kyi sgra chen po 'byin cing skar mda' dag kyang 'byin par byed do/_/de la rig sngags 'chang 
[\[59b.4\]]gis chu lha'i phyogs kyi gzugs la lan bdun bsngags pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun na med par 'gyur ro/_/chu lha'i phyogs kyi rgyal po sgo dpon ma mig ser ma zhes bya ba mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba bgegs chen po byed pa cig yod de de yang gsang sngags 
[\[59b.5\]]kyis bzlog par mi nus te/_rig sngags 'chang de rig sngags sgrub pa na nam gung gi thun la bgegs byed de des kyang sgra phyung bas dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jig par byed cing me'i gzugs kyis bgegs byed la skar mda' stong dag snang bar byed do/_/de la rigs 
[\[59b.6\]]sngags 'chang gis myur du lan bdun bsngags pa'i seng ldeng gi phur bu sor bzhi pas chu lha'i phyogs kyi gzugs la btab cing /_'di skad du mig ser ma 'dug shig 'dug shig ces smras na 'dug shig 'dug shig ces bya ba thos nas bdag ni rma phab bo snyam 
[\[59b.7\]]ste ngu 'bod kyi sgra chen po phyung nas med par 'gyur te/_rig sngags kyi dngos grub kyang grub par 'gyur ro/_/chu lha'i cho ga rdzogs so//_//de bas 'jam pa'i las 'di bshad de/_rig sngags 'chang rig sngags bsgrub pa na lan bdun bsngags pa'i seng 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]ldeng gi phur bu sor bzhi pa tshon sna lnga'i skud pas dkris pa/_bgegs thams cad kyi gnas su rkang pa g.yon pas mnan na bgegs thams cad bcom pa dang rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/_/zhag gsum smyung ba byas te mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam bcu 
[\[60a.2\]]bzhi la dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su song ste/_'byung po'i gtor ma yang byin la rig sngags lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na bgegs kyi las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/_bsams pas bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten skyong ba 
[\[60a.3\]]rnams kyi cho ga rdzogs so//_//de nas 'jig rten phan 'dod pa/_/thub pa kun dang lha chen gyis/_/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bdar/_/lhan cig tu ni 'dus par 'gyur/_/nyi ma bzhin du gzi 'bar zhing /_/dka' thub rnal 'byor ldan pa 
[\[60a.4\]]yi/_/thub pa rab mchog ldan pa kun/_/nyin mo bya ba byas nas 'khod/_/thub pa dag ni thams cad dang /_/bde byed lha tshogs lha rnams kyis/_/lag na rdo rje sems dpa' che/_/'byung po kun dbang rje la zhus/_/'jig rten dngos grub byed pa yi/_/
[\[60a.5\]]bgegs rnams dag ni ga la 'byung /_/de dag gi ni tshig thos nas/_/lag na rdo rje grags pa che/_/dga' bar gyur nas dris pa de/_/rgyas par yang ni rab bshad de/_/bgegs rnams ji ltar 'byung 'gyur ba/_/thub pa dag ni kun gyis nyon/_/lha rnams 
[\[60a.6\]]la yang lha min rnams/_/'thab pa'i phyir ni ldang ba ltar/_/sems can rnams la bgegs bya'i phyir/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung 'gyur/_/ci ltar lha yis lha min rnams/_/g.yul du lan brgyar bcom pa dang /_/brgya byin gyis 
[\[60a.7\]]ni g.yul bcom ltar/_/de bzhin bgegs rnams bcom par gyur/_/de tshe lha kun dga' gyur nas/_/'jig rten grags pa de dag ni/_/thams cad stobs dang ldan 'gyur zhing /_/de dag nga rgyal dregs pas rgyas/_/'jig rten don dang lha rnams kyi/_/
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]brtson 'grus dang ni mthu bskyed phyir/_/bde zhing rgya mtsho chen po ni/_/gshed byed dag ni dbyung bar brtsams/_/thub pa de dag rmongs pa ste/_/phan pa byas na stobs kyis rgyags/_/nga rgyal 'dis ni 'jig rten na/_/ring por mi thogs the tshom med/_/

[\[60b.4\]]'di dag rla ga byed pa/_/brtsams zhing tshar gcod nus pa yod/_/de nas lha yi mchog rnams kyis/_/lag na rdo rje dpal ldan mchog_/sbyor ba shes shing sbyor gnas nas/_/dpung chen dag ni rab sprul pa/_/rgyal ba'i blo gros rdo rje'i gdong /_/rdo rje 
[\[60b.5\]]lte ba gdong dkar ma/_/rdo rje mig ser 'og bag can/_/rdo rje nag mo pho nya che/_/dbang phyug chen po gnam ngo ma/_/drag mo rdo rje seng ge'i khri/_/shugs ldan ma dang rdo rje can/_/de bzhin bzhad ma rdo rje can/_/gtum mo rang gi thugs dang ni/_/nye ba'i

[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]dag song bar gyur/_/de nas skrag nas gdon de dag_/thams cad brdungs te sems stor cing /_/rdo rje nag mos 'jigs gzir bas/_/skyabs kyang rnyed par ma gyur te/_/rdo rje sgrogs kyis 'pham byas shing /_/rdo rje can gyi yul du

[\[61a.6\]]drag cing dge/_/mnga' bdag khyod kyis bka' stsal pa/_/de bzhin du ni bgyi bar 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas la ni skyabs su mchi/_/chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te/_/zhi la ma rungs 'dul ba po/_/khyod la rtag tu skyabs su mchi/_/sems can kun la phan 
[\[61a.7\]]pa'i phyir/_/stobs chen de ni skyes pa legs/_/bdag cag gi ni 'tsho ba yi/_/thabs kyi phyir yang bka' stsol cig_/de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang /_/bgad nas tshogs la smras pa ni/_/khyod kyis blang bar bya ba dang /_/mi blang ba yang bstan par bya/_/
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]gang dag rtag tu [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra dang /_/drin du mi gzo gtsang sbra med/_/byang chub sems ni rab nyams pa/_/skye bo de dag rtag tu long /_/nya dang sha sogs za ba dang /_/mi bya ba dag byed pa dang /_/rkang pas phyag rgya rdzi byed pa/_/skye bo de dag blang bar gyis/_/

[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]yum yang yid la bzhag nas ni/_/dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/_/las 'di dag kyang byas nas ni/_/dngos grub mchog 'gyur shes par bya/_/gang gis nyin mo yang rung ste/_zhag gcig smyung ba byas te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dri dang

[\[62a.6\]]'gro ste/_tshe lo khri bzhi stong thub cing nam 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'di byas te dngos grub kyi mchog bsgrubs na cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub sbyin par byed de/_mas bu la bya ba bzhin no/_/dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir dbang phyug chen po

[\[62b.1\]]de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags kyi rigs 'grub pa dang /_cho ga rgyas pa 'grub par shes par bya ste/_de nas las brtsam par bya'o/_/yid la bsams te phur bu gsum pas bshad pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang /_lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bsgrub par bya'o/_/

[\[62b.5\]]can chos nyan par bri'o/_/de'i 'og logs su lag na rdo rje mdog sngo bsangs la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa chos nyan par bri/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon logs su dbang phyug chen po 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog can thor tshugs dang cod pan thogs par bri/_
[\[62b.6\]]de'i g.yon logs su phur bu gsum pa'i ma/_ma tang gi cha lugs can chos nyan pa'i tshul de'i 'og logs su dbang phyug chen po 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i kha dog can/_/thor tshugs 'chang ba'i mgo la zla ba'i mtshan ma yod la mig gsum dang ldan par bri'o/_/
[\[62b.7\]]de'i drung du ma tang gi rgyal po phur bu gsum pa mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ma tang gi cha lugs su bri'o/_/de'i logs su 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi kha dog tha dad pa dang /_rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa chos nyan pa'i tshul du bri/_lag na rdo rje'i 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]logs su rdo rje sde dang gtsug nas byung rtse zhing 'dug par bri ste/_rdo rje sde ni gser gyi mdog can la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/_/gtsug nas byung gi mdog dmar la mig gsum yod pa glang po che'i pags pa'i smad g.yogs can klu'i

[\[63a.3\]]pa tsam du gsal ba lag na rdo rje'i kha nas 'byung bar bri'o/_/gzugs de mthong na sngon gyi sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/_log 'dren rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs so/_/gang ri mo'i gzugs 'di sgrub pa des ni dngos grub kyi mchog nges par 'grub par

[\[63a.5\]]ba dang /_sbyar thug gis bkang ba bzhi bzhi dbul zhing 'byung po'i gtor ma yang sbyin no/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dngos grub kyi mtshan ma byung gi bar du nam phyed kyi dus su me tog dri zhim po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod lan re re sbyar zhing bcom ldan 'das ma sangs rgyas 
[\[63a.6\]]kyi yum la bsnun na ri mo'i gzugs 'gul ba dang /_me tog gi phreng ba g.yo ba dang /_lha mo las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur te ri mo'i gzugs 'gul na ni dbab pa'i las dang /_zhi ba dang /_rgyas pa'i cho ga 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/me tog phreng ba g.yo na ni dbab pa'i

[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]lhag ma dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bsgrub par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des me tog dmar po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod lan re re dang sbyar te/_dbang phyug chen po la bsnun na de'i yang dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur 
[\[63b.2\]]te/_dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste phur bu gsum pa'i cho ga rgyas par bsgrub par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des me tog nag po stong rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod lan re dang sbyar te/_phur bu gsum pa'i ri mo la bsnun na de

[\[83a.1\]]sbyin sreg byas na yul gru sbyin par byed do/_/mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sna ma'i me tog kha ma bye ba brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na pho nya ma thams cad las so cog byed par 'gyur ro/_/rig

[\[101a.2\]]mthu zad pa gang yin pa dag dang /_rgyal po dbang phyug las nyams pa gang yin pa dag dang /_lha'am/_lha'i bu'am/_klu'am/_klu'i bu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_gnod sbyin gyi bu'am/_srin po'am/_srin po'i bu'am/_dri za'am/_dri za'i bu mthu chung ngu gang yin 
[\[101a.3\]]pa de dag gi mthu bskyed pa'i phyir yang ngas bshad par bya'o/_/mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te gnas dben pa'am/_n+ya gro d+ha'i drung du rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po las sman ut+pa la dang ldan pa zhes bya ba brtson 'grus chen mo/_/stobs chen mo/_/bcom ldan 
[\[101a.4\]]'das kyis gsungs pa'i sman de'i phye mas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khro bo bri bar bya ste/_lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs la lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du bum pa mi gnag cing rtsa ba med la mgrin chings dang bcas pa sa bon thams cad kyis gang bar 
[\[101a.5\]]byas te/_bum pa de'i nang du sman ut+pal dang ldan pa yang gzhug go/_/bum pa de yang gser las byas la 'gron bu bkram pa las byas pa'i rdo rje'i steng du ras dkar po bzhag ste/_de'i dbus su bum pa gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bsam pa rgya 
[\[101a.6\]]chen pos lha bshos dang mchod pa rgyas par bya ste/_/gu gul gyis bdug pa yang dbul lo/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dpal gyi lha mo'i rig sngags lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas nas de'i 'og tu rdo rje 'bar ba khro bo chen po lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[101a.7\]]nang par bum pa des bdag nyid khrus bya'o/_/'gron bu las byas pa'i rdo rje dang gos de yang 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la phul nas/_bla ma yang de dang 'dra ba'i phyir bla ma la dbul lo/_/de phul nas kyang yid la bsams pa bslang bar bya'o/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]kyang ci nus kyis ston par bya'o/_/des na lha thams cad kyi las mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/las 'di ni skal ba med pas mthong bar mi 'gyur te/_rig sngags las byung ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'am/_rig sngags 'chang gi rigs dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag gis

[\[101b.4\]]na rig sngags 'chang gis nga dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma yum de bshad kyis/_khyed rnams kyis rgyags pa med pa'i sems kyis nyon cig_/de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te bde ba 
[\[101b.5\]]dang /_yid bde bar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la bstod pa/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so/_/stobs dang pha rol gnod pa dpag tu med pa legs so/_/khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir byang chub sems 
[\[101b.6\]]dpa' chen po bskyed par byed pa shod cig shod cig_/de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po lag na rdo rjes rang gi rig sngags kyi tshogs rnams la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bltas so/_/'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad la yang bltas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag

[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]'jig rten yum bshad ma thag tu yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_mun pa dang ra ba rib dang ling tog gi mun nag thams cad med par gyur to/_/sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]

[\[102a.5\]]par ltung bar 'gyur ba ni ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/_de ni gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dper na nor bu rin po che mgo la thogs pa la nad do cog mi 'byung zhing gdon thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur ba bzhin te/_'di ltar ngan 'gro rnams las sgrol ba 'di ni 
[\[102a.6\]]yum dang sras su bcas pa'i mthu yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal nas/_yum gyi las rnams bshad pa/_sgrub pa thams cad la phyag rgya gcig bcings la sgrub pa'i rdzas la phyag rgyas btab na myur du dngos

[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]rgya bstan par bya'o/_/de yang 'bras chan bu ram dang sbyar ba'i mchod yon rdo rje la phul nas phyag rgya bstan par bya'o/_/de mthong na lag na rdo rje mthong ba yin te/_byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rnams la bstan par bya'i/_sdig pa byed pa rnams la bstan par mi bya'o/_/
[\[102b.2\]]sdig pa byed pa gang yin pa de dag gis ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi ming yang thos par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa gang yin pa de dag gis ni phyag rgya de dag thos par 'gyur ro/_/nga'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs 'di ni gtsang zhing dben par byas pas blta bar bya'o/_/

[\[102b.4\]]dbul zhing bla ma'i lag nas rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa mnod par bya'o/_/bla mas kyang bla ma la gus pa'i slob ma la lag nas mngon par dngos grub sbyin par bya'o/_/de ltar byas na lag na rdo rjes byin pa yin te/_cho ga rgyas pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste 
[\[102b.5\]]bla ma'i lag nas phyag rgya mthong ba tsam gyis las byas na phyag rgya de nyid kyis kyang gnod pa med par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas sam sku gdung gi gnas su phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhag par bya'o/_/phyag rgya mthong ba gang yin pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa 
[\[102b.6\]]yin par blta bar bya ste/_de dag thams cad lha rnams kyis phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro/_/nga gang na gnas pa de na de dag gnas te/_nga mthong bas de dag nges par phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing lus dang bral ba na lag na rdo rje'i gnas yid du 'ong 
[\[102b.7\]]ba'am/_bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya mthu stobs chen po nan tan du blta bar bya ste/_phyag rgya'i rnam pa lag pa'i tshul gyis bstan par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa bris pa mthong nas phyag rgya chen po rnam pa sna tshogs dgod par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]'das mA ma kI'i las rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te zas su 'o ma'am/_'dag gu'am/_lo ma'am/_slong mo'i zas za zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas ras ma nyams pa dang kha tshar ma bcad pa dang spu med pa

[\[103a.6\]]dang /_sngon ma byung ba'i dri bsung zhim po'i ngad ldang bar 'gyur ba dang /_'di rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_/de la spos chu me tog dang ldan pa'i mchod yon dbul bar bya'o/_/yang na lha mo 'ong bar 'gyur te phyag byas la dam pa rnam pa brgyad la dam pa rnam pa gcig
