[\[133a.2\]]zhes bya/_/gdon kun gtong bar 'gyur ba dang /_/gdon kun zhi bar byed pa dang /_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/nga yis su ni bshad pa yin/_/gang zhig sman gyi rgyal po yi/_/ming ni legs par dran byed pa/_/de 
[\[133a.3\]]la gdon rnams thams cad kyis/_/glags btsal phyir ni brtson mi byed/_/de phyir de la blud par bya/_/de bzhin snar yang blug par bya/_/cho ga 'di dag gis kyang ni/_/gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur/_/ci ste des kyang ma btang na/_/gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur 
[\[133a.4\]]ba'i/_/thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/_/dkyil 'khor bris la der gzhug par bya ste/_/dkyil 'khor der rig sngags kyi rgyal po'am/_/tshogs lcags can nam/_/rmugs byed kyis sbyin sreg bya'o/_/lha rnams 'di ni lag na rdo rje'i mtshams rlung yin te/_/gsor mi 
[\[133a.5\]]rung ba rnams kyang tshar gcod par byed do/_/gdon gang nga'i ming thos nas mi 'bros pa de la rdo rje drag pos spyi bo gshag par bya'o/_/lha rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas ma rungs pa rnams gzhom pa bzang po rnams ngas bshad zin to/_/smyo byed kyi gdon gyi skabs 
[\[133a.6\]]rdzogs so//_//sngar bshad pa ni gang yin gdon/_/lha ma yin gdon shes par bya/_/gtum zhing gzu lums che ba dang /_/'jig rten 'tshe bar byed pa'i ste/_/gzi brjid can dang lus che dang /_/gzugs bzang yon tan ldan pa la/_/lha ma yin ni 'jug 
[\[133a.7\]]par byed/_/de yi mtshan ma tshul bzhin nyon/_/rig sngags 'chang la brnyas par byed/_/rig byed kyang ni smra bar byed/_/skem byed nga yin khyab 'jug nga /_/zhes ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]yang smra bar byed/_/gdon kun gyi ni tshul dag dang /_/rnam pa mang por sgyur bar byed/_/ngu zhing 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]res 'gas sos kyang 'dzin/_/res 'ga' zas kyang za bar byed/_/lag pas rtswa dag blangs nas kyang /_/skad cig gis ni mi la 'tshe/_/tshig ngan dag kyang smra bar byed/_/shin tu yang ni dgod par byed/_/lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams kyi/_/mtshan ma yang ni de yin 
[\[133b.2\]]te/_/cho ga yang ni de bzhin du/_/de yi ngo lon gang dag gis/_/gdon de gtong bar 'gyur bar bya/_/me tog kun dang dri dag dang /_/me tog phreng ba sna tshogs dang /_/pad+ma ut+pal pu shel tsi/_/ut+pal dmar po'i 'dab ma dang /_/sha btsos dang ni rjen pa yin/_/
[\[133b.3\]]ngo lon dag ni 'jam por bya/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang dag gis/_/gtsang sbra bya ste nub phyogs sbyin/_/gtor ma las ni 'di nyid kyis/_/gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur/_/ci ste des kyang ma btang na/_/gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/_/thabs gzhan 
[\[133b.4\]]'di ni sbyar bar bya/_/'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba dang /_/ba la a ti ba la dang /_/thal tres dang ni bu shel tsi/_/rtsa ba lnga rnams bsogs nas ni/_/mar ni phul tag bzhi dag dang /_/ba gcin phul bzhi'i nang du btso/_/me ni chung dus dal nas btso/_/de nas de la 
[\[133b.5\]]blud par bya/_/de bzhin du ni snar yang blugs/_/mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs par 'gyur/_/snar blugs 'jigs pas gzir ba dang /_/mar 'thungs pas kyang 'jigs gyur nas/_/gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur/_/ci ste des kyang ma btang na/_/gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/_/thabs 
[\[133b.6\]]gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/_/rdo rje ser skyas sbyin sreg bya/_/rdo rje sgrog gis bcing bar bya/_/de dag sngags kyis tshar yang bcad/_/lha ma yin gyi gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so//_//de nas ngas ni sngar bshad gang /_/gzhon nu'i gdon bzhin shes par bya/_/gtum 
[\[133b.7\]]zhing khro la gzu lums can/_/'gro ba'i gnas dang mi gnas 'joms/_/tshes gnyis dang ni bcu gcig dang /_/mar gyi ngo yi zhag lnga dang /_/phal cher tshes bcu dag la rgyu/_/gzhon nu'i srog ni gcod byed pa/_/rtag tu gsum zhing rgyu bar byed/_/byis pas gsod cing 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]mi srun na/_/rigs bzhi ldan zhing rtag tu rgyu/_/gtor ma 'dod pa'i gdon chen yin/_/de las gzhan pa gang dag gis/_/rigs rnams ci 'dra bshad par gyis/_/nam gru bram zer shes par bya/_/bya ni rgyal rigs yin par bstan/_/skem 
[\[134a.2\]]byed rje'u rigs shes par bya/_/gzhon nu dmangs rigs shes par bya/_/gyen du lta ba gang yin dang /_/skad cig skad cig 'khor bar byed/_/rims dang lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/de ni nam gru'i gdon yin no/_/mig phab pa ni gang yin dang /_/so yang 'cha' bar byed pa dang /_/
[\[134a.3\]]rngam pa can dang rims btab gang /_/de ni bya nyid yin par bstan/_/glo bur du ni ngu ba gang /_/rims kyis btab cing rab tu rgyug/_/dngangs zhing dgod par byed pa dang /_/de bzhin 'dar zhing glal bar byed/_/byis pa gang gis kha dag nas/_/dri nga ba ni 'byung ba dang /_/
[\[134a.4\]]lus la rma dang 'brum bu 'byung /_/tsha zhing me yi mdog dang 'dra/_/mtshan mo dus mtshams ldang bar 'gyur/_/dus mtshams dag tu bab pa na/_/'khru zhing rims 'debs skyug pa dang /_/lus kyang sngon por gyur pa dang /_/gang zhig lus ni rdeb par byed/_/rims kyis 
[\[134a.5\]]kyang ni 'tshe ba dang /_/nu ma shin tu sos kyang 'debs/_/lan grangs mang du ngu zhing 'dar/_/mig kyang dmar por gyur pa dang /_/mi dga' mchu yang mur bar byed/_/byis pa skem byed zin pa yin/_/lag pa dang ni rkang pa gcig_/las byas pas ni tshigs kyang 
[\[134a.6\]]na/_/mig ni 'khor zhing lta bar byed/_/mig gcig kyang ni 'dzums par byed/_/rnag dang khrag gi dri yang mnam/_/smin ma ya gcig 'degs par byed/_/skem byed brjed byed gdon rnams kyi/_/mtshan ma dag tu bstan pa yin/_/gzhon nu'i gdon la gtor ma 
[\[134a.7\]]bya/_/legs par khrus byas gtsang mas sgrims/_/dbyig rnams dang ni gser rnams dang /_/gos kyang de la sbyin par bya/_/snum khur bkra shis 'bras yos dang /_/'bras chan dang ni zan dron dang /_/sha btsos dang ni rjen pa dang /_/chang dang til 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]zan rnams dang ni/_/til dang 'bras chan pu shel tsi/_/'bras kyi 'o thug yungs kar ldan/_/ba lang gi ni chu ka 'am/_/shing skam ma mo'i gnas dag tu/_/gtor ma me mar bcas pa 'di/_/srod la yang ni sbyin par bya/_/gtor ma'i 
[\[134b.2\]]las ni 'di nyid kyis/_/gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur/_/ci ste des kyang ma btang na/_/gang gis gdon de gtong ba yi/_/thabs gzhan dag ni sbyar bar bya/_/bu tshang rdo dang ram nye ba/_/gser phrom dang ni skyer ba yung /_/ka pid ta yi khu ba dang /_/pa la sha yi 
[\[134b.3\]]lo ma dang /_/sbrang rtsi ran tsam gzhug par bya/_/seng ldeng snying po tsha ba gsum/_/btsod dang shing mngar thams cad dang /_/de dag cha ni mnyam byas la/_/ra gcin dang ni btag par bya/_/mar ni phul bzhi gzhug par bya/_/ba gcin yang ni bzhi 'gyur blugs/_/go 
[\[134b.4\]]phye'i lo ma dag dang ni/_/bar ba ra ka rul pa dang /_/til rul nas kyi lo ma yin/_/blugs pa'i sman ni bya ba yin/_/mar ni phul tag phyed kyis kyang /_/gong bu'i sman mchog gtso bor bya/_/dus mtshams gnyis su mkhas pa yis/_/de ni khrus kyang byed du 
[\[134b.5\]]gzhug_/gzhon nu'i gdon ni thams cad las/_/gso ba'i thabs ni dam pa yin/_/kun nas gso ba'i thabs yod de/_/thams cad kyang ni 'tsho ba yod/_/cho ga 'di dag gis kyang ni/_/gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur/_/ci ste des kyang ma btang na/_/gang 
[\[134b.6\]]gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/_/thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyor bar bya/_/dga' byed gdong gis khrus bya zhing /_/gtor ma yang ni de la sbyin/_/yang na rig pa mchog gis bya/_/des na gdon de gtong bar 'gyur/_/gzhon nu'i gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so//_//

[\[135a.1\]]zhing spyod pa gtsang ba dang /_/mi rnams gzugs ni bzang ba dang /_/rgyan pos rtse la rab chags dang /_/bzhi mdor gang du rtse ba na/_/bram ze rgyal rigs rtag tu 'dzin/_/gnod sbyin gdon gyis zin gyur pa/_/de yi mtshan ma shes par bya/_/

[\[137a.1\]]yi ni the tshom dang /_/gang gis gnod sbyin gtong 'gyur dang /_/bsreg pa dang ni bcad pa dang /_/bsad cing rus pa gzhom pa dang /_/de dag cho ga rab bshad pa/_/de ni stobs chen bdag la gsungs/_/de ltar blo can che ba nyid/_/bdud rtsi thab

[\[182a.7\]]brkyang gi tshul du byas la lag pa g.yon pas de bzhin du byas pa ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o/_/rtsa ba'i phyag rgya nyid las rkang pa bsnyams te bsgrengs pa ni sa'i lha mo'i phyag rgya'o/_/rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las rkang pa gnyis bskums la mdzub mo brkyang ste bstan pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i gdon 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]zhi bar bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/mdun logs su mdzub mo gcig gi dbus bkug ste bzhag la gung mo brkyang ste bstan pa ni rdo rje gdan gyi phyag rgya'o/_/g.yon pa'i sor mo gnyis kyis de bzhin du byas pa ni lha'i phyag rgya'o/_/mdzub mo gcig pu ni 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[182b.2\]]gung mo ni rdo rje mdzes ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/g.yas brkyang gi tshul du gnas la lag pa g.yon pa'i sen mo rnams sbas te/_khu tshur bcangs nas de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje brkyang ste lta ba'i dmigs su gtad pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o/_/mdzub mo steng du bzhag 
[\[182b.3\]]pa ni snying po'i phyag rgya'o/_/gung mo yang de ltar byas pa ni ne ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o/_/gung mo dang mthe bo gnyis sbyar la sor mo gzhan rgyab tu bzhag pa ni rdo rje 'joms ma'i yin te/_phyogs bzhi bsrung ba yin no/_/g.yas brkyang gi tshul gyis lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje 
[\[182b.4\]]g.yas pa'i dpung mgor bzhag la lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje bstod nas dpung pa g.yon pa rna ba'i phyogs su bzhag ste lta ba'i dmigs su gtad pa ni rdo rje phag mo'i phyag rgya'o/_/g.yon brkyang gi tshul gyis lag pa g.yon pa bkan la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis bkug ste/_
[\[182b.5\]]pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar byas la g.yas pa yang de nyid dang 'dra bar bzhag pa ni lus dmar gyi phyag rgya'o/_/'bar ba'i phyag rgya yang de nyid yin no/_/snying po gang nas 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yang de nyid yin no/_/rdo rje b+h+ring gi ri ti'i phyag rgya yang de nyid yin no/_/g.yas brkyang gi tshul gyi lag 
[\[182b.6\]]pa g.yon pa bkan te brkyang la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung so sor bskyed nas sor mo lhag ma rnams klu mgo'i gdengs ka ltar bzhag_/g.yas pa yang mtshan nyid de dang 'dra bar byas la/_/gzhu 'gengs pa ltar gru mo rna ba'i phyogs su bzung ba ni klu chen po'i phyag rgya'o/_/khyab 'jug 
[\[182b.7\]]gi 'dug stangs kyis mthe bo'i sen mo rkang pa g.yon pa'i 'og tu sbyar te/_/lag pa steng dang bcas par sbyar ba'i mthil gyis gdeg cing lag pa bsnol bas bzung la/_/pho long gi thabs su gyen du sbar zhing lag pa bskor te bkan pas nu ma'i bar du gdeg cing bskor la/_/lag pa 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]gnyis kyi mthil logs kyi sor mo la bltas nas mig gyen khar bsgyur te bteg la glog sgyur ba'i phyag rgya yang bcings nas g.yon pa'i sor mo'i rdo rje'i chen po bstod pa byas na des lha dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_klu dang /_srin po rnams dang /_
[\[183a.2\]]log 'dren rnams dang /_'gram na gnas pa thams cad dang /_tshangs pa dang /_skem byed dang /_dbang chen dang /_drag po la sogs pa'i snying la glog 'gyu ba'i shugs 'di bab pas 'ong bar 'gyur te/_mthu stobs bcom nas rdo rje'i rjes su mthun pa dang dul zhing rdo rje la 'dud 
[\[183a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi phyir zhi bar byas na de'i tshe phyag rgya de snying gar bkrol ba de dag de'i mod las mthun par bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang zhing byams pa'i sems dang ldan par bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'byung ste/_lag 
[\[183a.4\]]pa g.yon pa phyir bstan g.yas pa nang du bstan de gcig tu sbyar nas/_lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyis g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung nas brtsams te re re nas bzung ste dkris la gru mo bsnyams nas phyag rgya snying gar bzhag ste mthe bong gnyis kyis so so'i srin lag mnan la lag pa gnyis 
[\[183a.5\]]phyir bstan pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/thabs de nyid las lag pa gnyis bkan pa ni bcings pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis ka'i mdzub mo dang mthe bo dang gdu bu ltar phan tshun sprad pa 'di ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud tha dad pa yin no/_/mthe bong gnyis bkyed 
[\[183a.6\]]pa ni rdo rje sgrog gi phyag rgya'o/_/g.yon pa bkan la g.yas pa khas phub ste/_sor mo rnams gcig la gcig bsdams pa 'di yang rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya yin no/_/de las khu tshur bcangs te mthe bong gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje thog gi phyag rgya'o/_/sor mo rnams phye ste khu tshur 
[\[183a.7\]]bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis kyis mnan te sgra dang bcas par brdab pa ni dgrol ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo'i sor mo bsnyams la mdzub mo gnyis so sor bkug ste/_/gung mo gnyis ngos la bstan pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/_/phan tshun bsnol te snyim pa 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]bzed la mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo gcig gis gcig bkab pa ni spyan drang ba yin no/_/de las bzlog pa ni slar btang ba yin no/_/de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi rdo rje tho ba phrag pa logs su bzhag ste/_/lta stangs kyis snying la bsdigs pa ni khro bo'i phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[183b.2\]]yig 'bru bcu pa'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i yin no/_/de nyid las bstod pa ni khro bo 'gro ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/mthe bong bkyed pa ni gzhom pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/g.yas pa'i mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyis g.yon pa'i khu tshur bzung la mdzub mo dang gung mo dang srin lag 
[\[183b.3\]]rnams brkyang ste/_mdung rtse gsum pa'i dbyibs ltar byas pa ni gtsug nas byung gi phyag rgya'o/_/me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya yang de nyid yin no/_/g.yon pa'i srin lag dang gung mo sbas pa ni gtsug nas byung gi phyag rgya tha dad pa yin no/_/lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang gung mo bkug 
[\[183b.4\]]pa ni mthe bos bzung la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid mdzub mo'i thor to mthe bo'i rtse mo logs su btud pa 'di ni rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i phyag rgya tha dad pa ste/_rdo rje rtse gcig pa yin no/_/gzhan yang nam mkha' lding 
[\[183b.5\]]dang dpal gyi be'u'i dbyibs de las mthe'u chung dang srin lag gnyis kyi thor to bkug pa ni mig gi phyag rgya zhes grags so/_/mthe'u chung dang srin lag dang gung mo rnams kyi thor to legs par bkug pa ni khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgya'o/_/ming med dang /_gung mo dang /_srin lag dang 
[\[183b.6\]]gung mo rnams kyi thor to legs par bkug pa ni khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgya'o/_/mdzub mo dang /_gung mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung rnams sprad la/_mthe bong gnyis kyi thor to gung mo dang srin lag gi mtshams su bzhag pa ni rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las srin lag dang 
[\[183b.7\]]gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs nang du bkug ste/_mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ba ni ru sbal gyi phyag rgya gnyis pa yin no/_/lag pa gnyis bla 'og tu bstan te bsnol la sor mo rnams gcig la gcig dkris nas mthe bong dang mthe'u chung rnams sprad pa ni ru sbal dang rdo rje sa 'og gi phyag 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis ka khu tshur bcangs la gung mo brkyang ste rdo rje ltar byas nas g.yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sgrol ma'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi thor to nas gang tsam gyis phye ba ni rdo rje yangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/nas 
[\[184a.2\]]gnyis tsam gyis phye ba ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya'o/_/mdzub mo gnyis brkyang pa ni kun tu yangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nas mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste sprad pa ni pad+ma yangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/mdzub mo gnyis [{]brkyang ma[,]rkyang ma[}]ra brjod pa ni rdo rjes 'og gi phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las gung 
[\[184a.3\]]mo gnyis kyi thor to'i tshigs dang po gdu bu ltar bkug la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sprad pa ni rdo rje dgra sta'i phyag rgya'o/_/g.yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba ni ral gri dang /_dgra sta'i phyag rgya'o/_/gung mo dang srin lag gnyis thor to bsnol te sbyar la/_mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung brkyang ste 
[\[184a.4\]]gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar ba ni rdo rje seng ge'i khri'i phyag rgya'o/_/mdzub mo dang gung mo gcig la gcig bstan la/_mthe bong brkyang ste sbyar nas mthe'u chung yang brkyang ste sbyar ba ni rdo rje lcags mda'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis bsnol la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ste sor 
[\[184a.5\]]gnyis tsam gyis phye ba ni ru sbal gyi phyag rgya dang /_phur bu dbyung ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis bsnol te sor mo thams cad sbyar bar bya ba ni rdo rje ra ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis bkan la mthe'u chung nang du sbyar te mdzub mo dang gung mo dang /_srin lag rnams rgyab tu bsgrengs 
[\[184a.6\]]nas mdzub mo dang gung mo dang srin lag rnams kyis mnan te mthe bong gnyis ru sbal gyi phyag rgya bzhin du byas pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/srin lag nang du bkug la mthe bong gnyis kyi tshigs drang por mnan mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang 
[\[184a.7\]]por sbyar nas mthe'u chung gnyis drang por sbyar ba ni mtshon cha chen po'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las mdzub mo gung mo gnyis kyi sen mo la brten pa ni mtshon cha mchog gi phyag rgya'o/_/mtshon cha chen po'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang po'i srubs kyi glor 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]gzhar ba ni mtshon cha'i shugs kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi thor to gung mo'i tshigs dang po nas cung zad bkug ste gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dbu mar sbyar ba ni mtshon cha'i snying po yin no/_/mtshon cha chen po de nyid las srin lag dang mthe bong ngos sbyar ba ni tshol ba'i mtshon 
[\[184b.2\]]cha'o/_/lag pa phyag rgya drang thabs su byas pa ni dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yin te phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya dang 'dra'o/_/nam mkha' lding gi dpal be'u'i phyag rgya ltar srin lag phye ste mthe bong gnyis drang por gshibs pa yang rdo rje dbyug sngon gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las mthe bong gnyis kyi 
[\[184b.3\]]tshigs dang po legs par bkug ste srin lag gnyis kyi drung du brtan pa ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/mda' bo che'i dbyibs ltar gung mo gnyis kyi drung du mthe bong gnyis gshibs pa'i rtse mo bkug pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/_/pad+ma'i gdan gyi dbyibs ltar byas te gung mo gnyis kyi 
[\[184b.4\]]thor to sprad pa ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o/_/mthe'u chung dang srin lag gdub bu ltar bkug la de bzhin tu sprad/_/gung mo gnyis gshibs pa mnan nas gshibs pa'i tshigs dang por mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba ni 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las mthe 
[\[184b.5\]]bong gnyis sen mo sprad pa de la srin lag gnyis sbyar ba ni lus las byung gi phyag rgya'o/_/thal ba'i khu tshur ni 'joms byed lnga'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis bkan te sor mo'i phyi rol du bsnol mar brkyang la mdzub mo bsrang ste thor to sbyar nas mthe bo brkyang nas mdung rtse gsum 
[\[184b.6\]]pa'i dbyibs ltar byas pa ni ta mu'i phyag rgya'o/_/mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi thor to mthe bos mnan la sor mo lhag ma rnams brkyang ste mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis bkan te sor mo'i dbyibs ltar byas pa ni lus dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis 
[\[184b.7\]]glang po che'i sna'i dbyibs ltar byas pa ni 'jigs byed kyi phyag rgya'o/_/smin ma yang bkug pa ni khro bo dbang phyug gi yin te/_/'di dag ni rigs kyi rgyal po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi phyag rgya yin no/_/mdzub mo gnyis so so'i gung mo'i drung du bkug pa ni log 'dren rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa'i 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]khu tshur nam mkha' ltar/_khong stong sbyar nas de bzhin du/_/mthe bong gnyis kyang bstod pa ni/_/tshangs pa zhes ni bya bar bshad/_/mthe bong gnyis ni btud nas kyang /_/cung zad bstod pa khyab 'jug gi/_/gung mo gyen du bsgreng byas la/_/de yi steng 
[\[185a.2\]]du mdzub mo dang /_/mthe bong lhan cig bzhag pa ni/_/nyi ma yi ni yin par bshad/_/g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi po rnams/_/g.yas pa yis ni bcum par bya/_/de ltar khu tshur bcang byas nas/_/mthe bong gnyis ni bskyed de sbyar/_/g.yon pa mthong bar byas pa

[\[185a.5\]]yi ni mdzub mo dang /_/gung mo tshigs kyi bar du ni/_/mthe bong gnyis kyi mtha' ma'i tshigs/_/sbyar zhing legs par gzhag par bya/_/g.yon pa'i mkhrig ma'i phyogs su ni/_/g.yas pas mthe bong brtan byas pa/_/seng ge'i rna ba 'dra ba ste/_/phyag rgya 
[\[185a.6\]]dpal ldan snying po yin/_/phyag rgya gsum po 'di dag ni/_/'khrul 'khor rnams kyi snying por bshad/_/'di dag gis ni sbyar byas shing /_/gsang sngags ldan par byas na ni/_/'khrul 'khor 'od 'bar gang yin dang /_/'khrul 'khor rtse mo mi zad gang /_/snang 
[\[185a.7\]]ba dang ni mi snang dang /_/che chung dang ni dkar nag rnams/_/thams cad kyang ni 'jigs 'gyur te/_/'di la dpyad par mi bya'o/_/'khrul 'khor phyag rgya gsum bshad pa/_/thor tshugs gsum pa yin par bshad/_/de la gnyis ka'i sor mo kun/_/'og gi phyogs 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]su brtan bya zhing /_/mthe bong yang ni de bzhin no/_/gung mo gyen du bsgreng nas ni/_/gnyis ka lhan cig sbyar bya ba/_/nam mkha' phyag rgyar bstan pa ste/_/lha chen gyi ni yin par shes/_/bdag nyid dang ni ldan pa yin/_/g.yon pa'i gung mo gang yin pa/_/gnyis 
[\[185b.2\]]ka yi ni bar du gzhug_/lag pa gnyis ka'i sor mo yi/_/lhag ma yang ni dgyed par bya/_/mthe bong gnyis kyang bskyed bya ste/_/lha mo'i phyag rgya yin par bshad/_/mdor na phyag rgya 'di dag ni/_/byas na las rnams grub pa ste/_/bgegs rnams zhi bar 'dod pa 
[\[185b.3\]]bzhin/_/rab tu bsgrims te sbyar bar bya/_/de las gzhan pa rgyud kun gyis/_/don kun sgrub par byed pa yi/_/phyag rgya spyi yi sgrub pa'i thabs/_/'di dag kyang ni bshad par bya/_/spyan drang la sogs don rnams la/_/bsrung ba la sogs las rnams las/_/sgrub pa pos ni rim 
[\[185b.4\]]bzhin du/_/phyag rgya 'di dag sbyar bar bya/_/phyag rgya kun gyi cho ga yi/_/gtang ba dang ni dgug pa la/_/shin tu bzlas pa'i sgrub pa po/_/bgegs rnams dang ni log 'dren gyis/_/ring du yongs su spong bar byed/_/thog mar las ni thams cad la/_/bgegs kun zhi 
[\[185b.5\]]bar bya ba'i phyir/_/bgegs rnams kun gyi dgrar gyur pa/_/bdud rtsi thab sbyor bshad par bya/_/lag pa gnyis ka'i mthe bong gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan la sor mo lhag ma rnams kyi bar nas gang tsam gyis phye ste rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas la de gnyis bsnol 
[\[185b.6\]]te dpung mgor bzhag nas mche ba mnan la drag tu lta zhing khur ba bus te rkang pa phral la 'greng zhing g.yas brkyang gi tshul gyis lus btud pa ni 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/'di mngon sum du bstan te/_log 'dren rnams dang gdon gzhan rnams 
[\[185b.7\]]chings shig ces byas na bcings par 'gyur ro/_/lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de ni las kyi rdo rje zhes bya'o/_/g.yas pa ni dam tshig gi rdo rje yin no/_/snyim pa bkan la mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol ba'i bar du srin lag gnyis bzhag nas mdzub mo gnyis dbus bkug 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]la gung mo gnyis gzhibs pa de'i tshigs dang por bstan te mthe bo gnyis glo la bcar nas snyim pa'i thabs su byas pa ni khrus kyi phyag rgya ste/_khrus byed pa'i tshe de la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas phyag rgya'i chu mgo bor blugs na bgegs rnams las grol zhing khrus 
[\[186a.2\]]byas nas kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nyid las mthe bong gnyis bar du bcug la gzhan thams cad snga ma bzhin du byas pa ni bsrung ba'i phyag rgya ste/_mgo bo dang lag pa gnyis dang snying kha dang lkog ma dang gnas lngar rim pa bzhin gtugs par bya'o/_/de nyid las mdzub mo 
[\[186a.3\]]gnyis bkug mthe bong gnyis tshigs dang po yang nang du btud pa ni lha thams cad kyi spyi'i khrus kyi phyag rgya'o/_/bsrung ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis btang ste rdo rje'i tshul du byas pa ni bsrung ba chen po log 'dren thams cad 'joms par byed pa yin te/_snying gar bzhag la nyi ma 
[\[186a.4\]]gcig bzlas brjod byas na log 'dren gyis zin pa las grol bar 'gyur te gdon thams cad la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/g.yon pa'i sor mo gnyis kyi mthe bong sbas te gdu bu ltar 'dug pa'i nang du mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo gnyis dbu bkug pa'i thor to bcug la lag pa 
[\[186a.5\]]g.yas pa sta zur phyogs su rdo rjer byas te las thams cad la dri dang me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa thams cad la sbyar na bgegs 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje de nyid g.yon pa'i gtum mo phyogs su bzung na gzi byin skye bar 'gyur ro/_/g.yon pa'i srin lag bsgreng ba'i ngos 
[\[186a.6\]]la mthe'u chung dang gung mo bsnol ba bstan te/_mdzub mos mthe'u chung gi thor to dam du bzung nas/_/mdzub mo dang gung mo'i thor to mthe bos mnan pa ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mche ba'i phyag rgya ste/_gdon thams cad dang bgegs chen po rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/_/sor mo 
[\[186a.7\]]rnams phan tshun bsnol la mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug pa'i steng du mdzub mo tshigs gcig bkug ste/_gdu bu'i thabs su sprad pa ni chu bstsal ba'i phyag rgya ste/_/chu la bskor nas ci dga' bar khrus bya'o/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo bkug pa ni de nyid spyan drang ba'i phyag 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]rgya'o/_/gnyis ka brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba yin te/_bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya yin no/_/lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa ni khro bo chen po'i phyag rgya ste/_bcing ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su bshad pa'i las gang dang gang yin pa de dang de la khro bo chen po sbyar 
[\[186b.2\]]bar bya'o/_/spyan drang ba dang /_slar btang ba la yang phyag rgya rnams ji lta ba bzhin du sngags dang sbyar bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi phyag rgya thams cad la yang de dag nyid kyis sbyar bar bya'o/_/snyim pa las mthe'u chung dang srin lag phan tshun bsnol te mthe bong gnyis glo la sbyar mdzub 
[\[186b.3\]]mo glod de dbus bkug la gung mo gshibs pa'i tshigs dang por gzhag pa ni rig gsum car gyi spyi'i mchod yon gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du sor mo phrugs gsum phan tshun bsnol la mdzub mo brkyang ba'i thor to sprad nas mthe bong gnyis kyis glo la gzhar te snyim pa'i thabs su

[\[196a.1\]]kho ra khor yug drang bar bya/_/thig drangs de yi steng dag tu/_/thig ni snyoms par legs par bri/_/rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma/_/rmad du byung ba de nyid brjod/_/thub chen gnas par gyur pa yi/_/khor yug brag ni rgya che ba/_/rang 'byung gis ni bstan

[\[196b.1\]]rten gsum dag gi/_/'jigs byed drag po yin par nges/_/de nyid ngo mtshar bye ba snyed/_/ya mtshan rnams kyang ston pa yin/_/gcig pu rdo rje gnyis ldan pa/_/de nyid kyi ni drung dag tu/_/dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi bo dag_/byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga bya/_/

[\[197a.1\]]par bstan/_/lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las gnas gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma/_/rmad du byung ba de dran zhing /_/g.yon phyogs dag tu [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/lha rnams kyang ni dgod par
